What is the film about?
Color-blindness affects many people. Statistically, everyone in this country knows someone who is color-blind, though thankfully most of the time we are not affected by it. These are the stories of those who are affected, both by birth and by injury, both drastically and unknowingly. In our society, we cherish our visual field, but we also demand it to be understood uniformly. Policemen, firemen, pilots, army men, coast guard, railroad workers, electricians, astronauts, artists, and many more occupations won't allow for any inconsistency in color determination. You are either born capable, or born unable. Many who dream to serve their country, boldly explore, or even share their interpretation of life gain the skills necessary by putting forth an unyielding, uncompromising effort to become something they envision themselves to be; they strive to achieve, and sacrifice greatly to make something of themselves. In their world, they are perfect; but others often come to them and tell them their view of the world is incorrect. As a countless collection of passionate individuals are turned away from their dreams, our society loses something great.
This isn't necessarily the end of their road. There is a man, after many years of feverish research, capable of giving them colors to liven the world around them. With his help, many will be capable of achieving great and noble things. Hundreds every year are able to turn their lives around, but there are many, many more who still live in a depression, unaware of the opportunity to realize their dream.
As we follow a few men and women, bold enough to try anything, we find that some are too far away from the color spectrum to be helped. In their release from hope, some will find peace in the lives they can see for themselves. This is a documentary following people who are color-blind, but ultimately it is more than that. It is a film about the human condition, highlighting the capabilities of those who won't give up.
What We Need & What You Get 
We have carefully calculated everything we'll need to finish this film!
In order to tell the stories of the people who wrestle with color-blindness, we need to be able to show you what they're talking about. What are their dreams? What do they wish they could do? What has happened to them in their journey so far? Many times, we are unable to access secure locations such as police departments, fire stations, space exploration facilities, and other high-security locations; so in order to tell the story, we'll need to do some dramatic recreations! All these elements raise the cost of a production.
In trying to determine a budget for "Life Without Color", we collaborated to determine exactly what we would need to recreate the stories, who we'd need, and for how long. The figure we came out with to comfortably produce the film was ambitious, so we came out with new figures to give us the bare minimum to push our film forward.
Here's how your donations will be spent:
EQUIPMENT RENTAL: Cameras, lights, sound etc. We've got the majority of what we'll need, though there are some things we can use to make production value much higher, which will make what you see look even better.
CREW: The extremely talented folk needed to run that fancy equipment. 
CAST: Some we'll be able to get to volunteer, though not everyone can afford to be so generous. 
WARDROBE: In our society, we generally need clothes! 
FOOD: Got to feed all these folks during production!
LOCATIONS: As I mentioned above these are often times huge expenses.
POST-PRODUCTION COSTS: Editing, audio mastering, etc. 
While $30,000 is the MINIMUM we need to produce the film at a quality level I would be proud to present, any amount OVER the $30,000 we raise here will go towards making it an even more polished product as well as creating avenues for distributing it more widely to the world.
The Impact 
By backing this adventure, you will become a critical part that can change the lives of potentially millions of troubled citizens of the world. Many people are affected by color-blindness, but not everyone is affected negatively. This film will show those who are challenged to their very core by the condition, and documents the strength of their will to overcome and achieve their dreams. This is a very personal project for me, as I am color-blind myself, and I can therefore promise a personal stake in the integrity of story and sincerity in the message delivered by the film.
I am a story-producer, by day and night, feverishly researching new ways to tell story, and investing all of my heart in building fluency in the art of understanding. I am not only prepared to create something I believe will be special, I was born to do it.
Low on Cash? Here's An Alternative! 
Use all the amazing Kickstarter share tools!
Spread the word about "Life Without Color" and this fundraising campaign, especially to those who are or know someone affected by this condition that so many overlook! 
The LIFE WITHOUT COLOR Crew:
Robb Jacobson - Director
Robb has a great passion, and has chosen to invest in one thing only. He believes, as human beings, our world revolves around story. Perspectives are how we dictate our feelings, how we connect from great distances, how we can love something we've never seen before.
We've always had story, and we've always struggled to show it in a unique light. But with struggle, we open up the potential for great triumph, the likes of which is paramount for creating a true connection between subject and audience.
Robb has background in a great many things, having held many different jobs (NPR, ABC, FOX, CBS, TLC, A&E). None of them have been the same, none of them have been directing film, but they've all had one central task: Storytelling.
Nothing demands more thought, consideration, and obsession in Robb's mind than finding new ways to tell story. It is what fuels his fire, and it will be the foundation in the creation of this documentary. He is investing everything he's worked for in this belief, and doesn't find anything to be more worthy.
Cindy Scott - Co-Producer
Cindy has worked as a jack-of-all-trades in media for the last ten years. Her entertainment career started at PBS in Grand Rapids, MI. Since then, she has worked on various productions in New York, Los Angeles and most recently Austin, where she currently lives with her hunky boyfriend ;-)
Cindy has directed projects with Emmy Award winning writer/producer Tom Caltabiano, as well as edited sizzle projects for the Emmy Award winning creator of ‘Everybody Loves Raymond’, Phil Rosenthal.
She also serves as a fundraising mentor for the Austin chapter of Team in Training, a non-profit fundraising program that raises funds for the world's largest voluntary health agency dedicated to blood cancer, The Leukemia & Lymphoma Society (LLS).
In her spare time Cindy loves to be outdoors. It is not rare to find her hiking, running or kayaking on your ordinary weekend.
Special Rewards
The Soundtrack! - Available at $15, $40, $75, $100
We have an ambitious goal to work with a composer/conductor to create original music for the film. A dedicated and personalized orchestra brings greater sound and clearer emotion for stories that deserve as much. The more funding we raise, the bigger the orchestra we can hire! Words often fail us, but music is the bridge between our hearts and souls. With this, we can connect you to the world of the color-blind!

The Poster - Available at $75
Option 1
  Option 2
You can choose between two options, both designed by our extremely talented graphic designer, Heston Godby! If you would like, the posters can also be signed by the director!

$100 - Be in the Movie!
Take a 1920x1080 photo of your eye (camera on your iPhone should work) of this size and we will use it at the end of the film to show the credits! Make sure your eye matches this photo as close as you can get it to, with the colorful iris touching the edge of the frame. It should be as in focus as possible, so have a friend take it for you. Try and show as much of your eye as possible, and we can crop out everything else to make it look nice! The names and titles of those involved will be in the pupil. But we'll add your name to the bottom right corner so you can easily identify your own eye. ;)
This is what it will look like on screen before we crop it to look perfect!
$150 - REALLY Be in the Movie!
Travel to Texas to film with us! We'll be using a good portion of our funding on creating re-enactments for stories told by the color-blind subjects, as well as creating general footage to round out the film. Our goal is to create a work that resembles the style of NPR's RadioLab (except it's for the big screen instead of radio)! You'll have to arrange for your own travel, stay, and transportation, but when you're on set, we'll use you in a big way, giving you significant screen time, to tell stories seen and felt by many! Our scheduled production will be during August and some of September of this year!
  $500 - Artwork by Color-Blind Artist
Meghan Sims - Colorblind Artist
Meghan was born with a rare visual condition called Achromatopsia. This means that she is completely colour blind, near sighted and extremely sensitive to light causing day blindness. Growing up, she had an immensely difficult time coping and adjusting to the world around her. She felt as though she was an outsider looking in, she felt that she was different, that she had no place here. Meghan had spent the majority of her life trying to hide this, trying to be “normal” and only found release and complete comfort when painting. 
Through her work, Meghan hopes to communicate her visual perception to the world around her in hopes of educating and connecting with others about what it is like living with Achromatopsia. Meghan is constantly exploring new mediums but works primarily with acrylics, discarded glass and photography. Acrylics allow the artist to work quickly as her eyes do not allow her to work for long periods of time. The use of glass and photography are used as vehicles for the artist to explore and simulate the sheer overpowering brilliance of light without causing her eyes harm. Meghan is extremely curious about the idea of perception. 
Through her work, she offers a two dimensional glimpse into the world of an Achromat. Through her work, she hopes to share the profound effect art has made in her life. She believes art has an intense power to heal and is a universal communicator for all to see.

HOW IT WORKS?
Here's some little info about Kickstarter and this campaing! :) If you want to know more, please check the appart about Need some help with Kickstarter? above!
Pledge now pay later! 
Kickstarter only charges your account after the project ends which gives you full flexibility to cancel, edit, or add to your pledge during the project time period! If the main goal is not met within 30 days, all pledges will be completely refunded! So why pledge now instead of later? If you're Pledging during the project will help unlock designs and make them into a reality. Baker also get the enamel pins at special discounted price!
Timeline 
 Mid-May: Kickstarter starts.
 June: 14 day processing for funds to deposit into bank.
 July: Production begins.
 August: Get pins from manufacturer, check out their quality and ship out your  rewards. 
Cost Breakdown 
 Pin production 70%: The majority of the funds are used to produce the enamel pins and stickers as well as cover the manufacture fees and shipping costs.
 Shipping & Packing 10%: This is to cover any and all supplies needed to ship out rewards to the bakers which may include: bubble mailers, clear bags, backing cards.. and also the shipping fees that correlate with how many enamel pins you will be receiving.
 Kickstarter Fees 20%: Kickstarter charges every successful project a small fee for operating through them as well as all credit card transactions.

Inkromancy is a curated, collaborative Tarot Deck project made by tattoo artists from around the world. We wanted to create a way for tattoo clients, enthusiasts, and collectors to be able to have unique art pieces from some of their favorite tattoo artists (as well as discover new favorites!). Inkromancy 2: Apocalypse is our 2nd deck and it'll be a limited-edition deck with a one-time run. Each card features the work of a different tattoo artist, to create a complete, 78-card tarot deck. The back of each card features artwork by Jordanne Le Fae with silver foil accents. Keep your cards safe with a custom, rigid box featuring the Inkromancy design. Each box is individually numbered in this limited-edition printing. Only 1,000 decks will be made!
Check out some of the card art below, the card names and numbers will be added to all the cards, so stay tuned to the campaign for more card art as it progresses. 
Card titles will be added before printing.
More cards to be added soon!
Deck Specs:
Standard tarot card size (70 x 120 mm)
300gsm art paper
Rigid 2-piece box
The idea started from a desire, when founder Jordanne Le Fae wanted to work with other tattoo artists in a collaborative way, creating something completely unique together. Inkromancy is also a way for clients and consumers to develop new connections with tattoo artists they haven't heard of before. This tarot deck promotes collectible art as well as a unique way to find your next tattoo artist! The long-term dream is to continue to create yearly decks with different themes: neotraditional, traditional, black and white, realism, nuschool... etc. BUT! This deck is themed around the fact that 2020 was a real Apocalypse for most of us, and our artists channeled their creativity around that!

I NEED YOUR SUPPORT TO LAUNCH A DARK FANTASY COMIC BOOK SERIES.
I'm Dan O'Callaghan, an Ardent Comics creator, and I've recently finished making my very first Comic Book series, Descendant of the Nephilim.
This collected edition will bring the first four issues together in one wicked volume, it also includes a few pages of conceptual artwork and script sample excerpts as well.

This is my 112-page dark fantasy comic book series, about a young magician who has the souls of the dead trapped in his veins and who desperately wants to find a cure to his curse.

ABOUT THE BOOK
Descendant of the Nephilim is about a young man who has run away from home or to put it another way, has escaped his father’s kingdom of supernatural beings.
Will, wants to forget the Nephilim Kingdom and using his supernatural powers, he finds a place to hide in plain sight, performing mistake-filled magic acts at a run-down theatre, what he really wants though is to find a cure to his inhuman abilities and become his own man, but evil forces are trying to pull Will back into the dark world of The Nephilim.
There are some classic themes that run through this series of what we inherit from our parents, our predetermined destiny and how we can break it, but these themes are explored in unusual ways that are inherent to Will’s supernatural powers, about the objects and people in our lives, what value they have for us and how death affects our relationship with them.
The art of this series reflects the story; it is mutated, fancifully deformed and intricate. One central idea behind the art of DOTN was to do away with comic book panels or frames, if you like, to explore the concept of images within images, much like the theme in DOTN of souls carried within the bodies of others.
Will hides in plain sight, amongst the humans as a lowly magician, an occupation shrouded in peculiarity and intrigue, somehow makes it easier to hide his abilities.

THE MISFITS
 Flower Face Charlie was the first soul spawn that Will created when he popped a pimple and a single drop of blood fell onto a flower.
THE MURDERERS

Frank the Nephilim king wields control over the soul spawns, unlike any other Nephilim, creating violent monstrosities and frightening freaks of nature.
REWARDS
                     STRETCH GOAL
Monster Postcards - Added to all $30 and above backers if the campaign reaches 100 backers in total or if it reaches $2,800 in funds.
Last 2 character sketches to be revealed before the campaigns end.

TIMELINE This book has already been written, illustrated and published in a 4 issue mini-series format, enjoying a humble tour of Australian conventions and being stocked in a few comic book stores.
All that's left creatively is to make sure these issues are consolidated together in a nice premium format book. We'll see a proof of the book, before finalising it and sending it to print.
This will allow the book and art print backers to receive their rewards quite quickly, following a successful campaign we will have these rewards starting to be delivered to backers in November of this year.
September: Run The Kickstarter. See it succeed. Thank you All!
Early October: Print The Book. Print The Art Prints.
Late October: Packaging and shipping preparation. Thank you again.
November: Send Rewards. Thanking you all one last time.
ABOUT ME
Daniel O'Callaghan
Hi I’m Dan, I began publishing comic books under the label of Ardent Comics in 2014, after working a number of jobs in many different artistic and non-artistic fields.
A year later, I met Jessica Gibson at a local comic book convention and not too long after, the two of us started working on Feral Horizon, marking myself and Jessica’s first collaborative comic book series.

Descendant of the Nephilim was the first comic book series that I wrote and illustrated, in my early twenties.
This series is very much a teenager’s story though; the themes and ideas behind the series, I think started to develop in my head, way back in high school.

I've published a few comic book Issues of a couple of mini-series now and have toured up and down Australia, sharing them with story and art hungry audiences of all kinds.

Christian World gives people information about God and His power, Christianity around the world, and it evangelizes and teaches people. Newspapers are inherently trusted by the ministry’s target audience, the former Soviet Union people, because they have been taught by the communist government to trust the newspapers.
     Christian World is an independent, non-denominational newspaper. A wonderful variety of Christian churches including Pentecostal, Baptist, Charismatic, Church of God, Lutheran, Salvation Army, Orthodox, and Catholic take part, working together by sending articles, and ordering and distributing copies of Christian World. Because Christian World is nondenominational, it does not favor or criticize any denomination or religion. “Christian World” just invites people to come to Jesus Christ, and the people respond. Because the paper is distributed through the mail, it reaches people who want to know about Jesus but are still afraid to go to church. It reaches those who are unable to attend worship due to disability; and it reaches many persons who live in small villages where there is no church. Do people respond to the Gospel via Christian World? Pastors have told us of people who came to Church and accepted Jesus as Savior through the influence of our newspaper. Because it is an officially registered nationwide newspaper, many government officials recognize it.
  We need to say some more about distribution. One of them is by subscription. It is a major way by which we distribute it. Ukraine has a different subscription system than America. In order to subscribe to a newspaper, people must go to the Post Office and select the publication from an official catalog. After that they receive it by mail. Christian World has an agreement with the Ukrainian general Post Office, which advertises the paper through a catalog in every post office in the country. People have the opportunity to subscribe to the Newspaper not only for themselves but also for their unbelieving friends, relatives, and even enemies. We received a letter from one lady who subscribed for four people, and she has done this before. Last year she subscribed for six people. Now, one of them has purchased a subscription for himself, and another has started to go to church.   
 Single copies of Christian World are sold through news stands, small shops, and at the Post Office. People who do not want to subscribe, or who want to try a single copy, can readily pick up a copy in their neighborhood.
Christian World is also available in a number of churches. Some Churches and Church Unions across Ukraine order it regularly to distribute to their members, and to evangelize in their communities. Every year churches in Ukraine, order and distribute Christian World in their local region by going from apartment to apartment distributing thousands of copies. When Dr. Paul Yonngi Cho, from South Korea, pastor of the largest church in the world, came to Kiev in 1996, several Pentecostal and Baptist unions ordered special issues of Christian World which featured him and South Korea. Korean pastors, worked with Viktor, providing the material about Pastor Cho and his church. Viktor presented the special issue of the paper to Pastor Cho in the Kiev airport when he arrived. Ten thousand copies were distributed in Dinamo Stadium during the three days of evangelization meetings.
In April 2005 Kharkov city was visited by the very well known Korean pastor and preacher Le Cho Soc. He has a church of 15,000 people in Seoul. Mainly he preaches about healing. For his visit Viktor prepared a special issue of “Christian World”, like he did it for pastor Cho. Viktor was given the materials about him and his ministry from his people. After the meeting, Viktor and a few other pastors had dinner with pastor Soc, and took an exclusive interview for “Christian World”. 
 Unfortunately, all the activities were slowed down and stopped during 2011-2012 years. Viktor’s wife Nataly got sick with a cancer and went through several surgeries and then through radioactive treatment and rehabilitation. It took several years just fighting, struggling, and concentrating on family needs.
 Other member of RESL board about same time went through the life cataclysm also and their lives were dramatically changed.
Economic downturn in USA after 2008 played big role in loosing a lot of supporters.
Registered organization in USA (RESL) was lost. Organization in Ukraine Christian World had been saved.
During all those years after 2012 Viktor had been thinking that Christian World would never be revived. Situation was broken past not only in USA but also in Ukraine.
Another revolution. People in Ukraine were fighting for a better life. But as it turned out the new Ukrainian president and government more corruptive and deceitful than previous. Russian president Vladimir Putin used the chaos and instability inside Ukraine to take some territories and start armed conflict on the east of Ukraine not far from the city where Viktor was born and where Christian World was published.
All these circumstances threw the country in very deep downward economic crisis. More than two millions refuge inside the country searching for new homes, because the old one had been destroyed. It seems, people were only thinking how they could buy a food and pay their bills. Viktor’s last visit to Ukraine in 2016 showed that ordinary people were disorientated, depressed and looking for help more than ever before. They do not want to live in a country where corruption is everywhere. The people fight against corruption. They also do not want to go back to USSR, which Putin wants to restore. They want to live good but do not know how. Who else can help them and give them hope if not Jesus? So, Viktor came back to the USA with a desire to renew the ministry and help again the Ukrainian people to find help in Jesus.
As previous ministry RESL had begun on boundary old and new 1994 years. This passage from old to new 2017 years emphasize new beginning.


  Magazine issue

Hello! We are PIANOCHOCOLATE and let us present our amazing music. 
     Have you ever thought about what the modern music is now? I guess yes, and you probably asked this question far more than once. And let’s be honest to each other: the most part of all the musical projects of the last several years could be compared only with fast-food products. That insipid heap of different sounds bringing some kind of transient joy at the first time disappears from our memory rapidly as if it hadn’t even been heard and leaves upsetting aftertaste at worst… 
     That is why there is nothing astonishing in the fact that we are trying to back to something old again and again, we are listening to significant records made by people who considered music not as just some kind of pure business. The music of the past times breathes the honesty and seems to us more alive than lax sub products of the musical industry of the present. 
     But coming back to the same music over and over again is, in spite of our great love, simply making no headway or, to be more precise, endless replay. 
     Our project called PIANOCHOCOLATE is a symphony of beautiful melodies, tender sounds of violins and pianos, a combination of some neoclassical elements – that Is why almost all our tracks are instrumental… PIANOCHOCOLATE is a carefully thought-out synthesis of all the best things that we have in modern electronic music and sincere warmness brought by bands and composers of some earlier times. We’ve tried to borrow the highest level of quality from some modern projects and addressed to a broad range of opportunities which our present time can offer. On the other hand, PIANOCHOCOLATE has got the same warmness and sincerity like the old music had – to cut the long story short, let us say that our project gathered all the best things presented by different musical epochs. 
     We want this music, which makes the one stop, think and go away from the breakneck rhythm of life for at least a few minutes of harmony and calmness to be heard by people tired of artificiality. By people looking for something that would awake pure and light dreams and thoughts. By people, who do not just live a life but are able to appreciate every single moment. So, it is you who can help us to make this dream come true and give us a chance to offer to people not a disposable surrogate but a real qualitative music. 
     A new album is planned to be produced in autumn of 2012, and it’s up to you to make our project even better than now. The opportunity to pay for the working in the studio of a top-class together with mixing and mastering engineers of standing reputation would help us to bring the sound of PIANOCHOCOLATE to perfection. 
     Supporting PIANOCHOCOLATE you are assisting not just another musical project, but, more than that, giving a chance to prove that music is not a source of money, not a business and not a way to stunning popularity. Music is a wish to give people some piece of light and to share a melody of one’s own inner harmony.

Hello, my name is Anouk Kruithof and I am a Netherlands born artist living in New York. For almost 12 years I have been exploring and questioning the picture-plane, image, materiality, physicality and philosophy of the medium photography. My multi-layered, mostly idea-based interdisciplinary projects take the form of photographs; photographic, video or spatial installations; text; sculpture; take-away ephemera and performance. Besides all that I am a frenetic artistbook-maker! I've made 9 books so far, which u can check out here:
the black hole
becoming blue
playing borders (this contemporary state of mind)
the daily exhaustion
happy birthday to you
a head with wings
pixel-stress
untitled (I‘ve taken to many photo’s / I’ve never taken a photo) 
the most recent one, the bungalow 
my 9 books till so far....
I started Stresspress.biz last year, its a versatile publishing platform that includes my various book projects, some of my critical writings about artists’ books and my short fictional stories. Over the coming years Stresspress.biz will develop into a platform for collaboration with other writers and artists on publishing in the extended field.
an impression of the pages out of AUTOMAGIC
I've been working on AUTOMAGIC since May 2011.  It will be an extensive book which contains images and text out of the past 12 years of my "automagic archive". The book does not attempt to have a clear narrative, thus this will be created by the viewer from their own memories and associations towards the open-image stories and stimulated by text notes and short fictional stories.
AUTOMAGIC refers to the unexplainable behaviour of something
At this moment there’s a lot of research about how taking photos changes our perspective in memory. We’re outsourcing our memory to the cards in our camera’s and our smart phones, and the interruption of attention when taking a picture can also hinder our future retrospection. I am pretty guilty of those thoughts, because I am always framing the world and always have been, since the moment I got my first camera as a child. My memories might not be rooted in my mind as actual memories of events, but unreal memories created by taking photos, looking at them and reworking them. 
My book AUTOMAGIC is an exploration and demonstration, which represents a transformed image archive by means of analogue photo-montages, screenshots, reproductions, editing and the addition of text. AUTOMAGIC will be hardcover US letter size, almost 2 inch thick book, consisting of many different chapters printed on different paper. The diversity of chapters and topics, the tactility of the paper feel will make of this book a layered sculpture. 
a limbo between fact and fiction
 there is no appropriation in this book
This book shows the adventure, the sheer infinity of possibilities of the medium photography as a vehicle of resourcefulness and the computer and human mind as processors of ways to look at our world. 
The photos out of which AUTOMAGIC exists were made in: 
Turkey, Thailand, Cambodia, Laos, Jamaica, Panama, Australia, Korea, Morocco, Egypt, Tunesia, New York, San Francisco, Los Angeles, Joshua Tree Park, Woodstock, Syracuse, Boston, Richmond, Amsterdam, Rotterdam, Beetsterzwaag, Paris, France, Sardinia, Venice, Italy, Barcelona, Spain, Belgium, Berlin, Germany, Switzerland, Moscow, St. Petersburg, Austria, Prague, Slovakia, Slovenia, Stockholm, London, Leeds, Bristol, Mexico, Guatemala, Belize and the OCEANS...
 A clear conceptual starting point in the process making this book was to deliberately mix all origins (date and place taken) in an attempt to erase geographical locations and its borders and unify people with different religion, culture, age, gender and nationality. 
A book as holistic idea
As u might know or not know, artistbook-making is a very unprofitable thing to do. I love bookmaking, that’s why I've made 9 books so far in collaboration with different independent publishers from all over the world, and as well self-published 2 of them. Every time I am thinking of producing a book there is this huge hesitation on the... 
“ok where do I get the money from to realize this book-dream”                   
… I will self-publish AUTOMAGIC under stresspress.biz and I know this thick book with more than 1000 pages, the high-end features, such as the printing on different pages, the proper binding and the painting of the 3 paper sizes of this book (the book becomes a yellow rectangle block-object with nothing on it) will have high costs. Not to even talk about paying my collaborators, such as interns, the graphic designer, translators, text-editors I work with, studio-rent, flight-tickets, material and so on…
I have never created a Kickstarter before, but I've supported some fundraiser-campaigns of others I encountered through friends, acquaintances and colleagues. I am doing this Kickstarter campaign, to raise money for the production of the book AUTOMAGIC. If I exceed my goal of raising 25.000 euro, I will use the additional proceeds for the development of stresspress.biz as a publishing platform, which is needed too. 
<< !! Without your help AUTOMAGIC won’t become reality !! >>
I am super grateful for your support! 
thank you very much!
AUTOMAGIC will be published in an edition of 500 or 1000 depending on the requests through this campaign and the books will be numbered and "KISSED-INSTEAD-OF-SIGNED" on request. 
Most likely published under stresspress.biz but I am open for collaborations with publishers as well. It will depend on possibilities for collaboration, so let's wait a bit and see...
Underneath you get an impression how this looks. For Kickstarter backers their AUTOMAGIC books will be "KISSED-INSTEAD-OF-SIGNED" for sure!
impression of how a print or book looks like, when it's numbered and "kissed-instead-of-signed"
I GOT MANY QUESTIONS REGARDING THE BUDGET. I got questions like: "25.000 EURO IS A HUGE AMOUNT FOR JUST A BOOK" 
underneath I ll explain the costs of this book. Publishing a book of the size US letter / A4 about 2 inches thick and 1000 up to 1500 pages is quite an object, not to compare with any of my previous books in terms of size. I will work with a high-end printer and binder and my hero graphic designer: Christoph Nussli.
printing: 22.000
binding: 5000 
designer: 3000
material costs: 1000
?? costs for : storage, a company sending out the books, mailing costs
quite a lot of the money collected over Kickstarter will flow back to the backers in terms of the rewards, prints, books, Skype-calls, meetings.. To mail the rewards to everyone and making them costs money too so basically you have to minus those from the amount of 25.000 euro as well, in the sense of what's left after those expenses.
I want to exceed my goal of 25.000 euro, because with that amount I can't even make the book, I will because I will invest myself and/or find another source to fill any gaps. 
I hope this clarifies something for people who don't know how expensive and not lucrative artist-book-making is.

This film has been my baby since 2007. I have done a lot of work on this project with a lot of my own money. However we do need a little help to finish this project. I have a deep passion for writing and acting and this film is a culmination of both of those passions. I have dedicated 8 years of my life to making this work and I will keep fighting regardless of how this all turns out. I know there are a lot of people out there asking for your money and I can appreciate that. This isn't just another hey, let me have your money for something I will never finish kind of deal. Eight years of my life have gone into this project and if I haven't quit or given up in that period of time I'm not going to stop now. People will always tell you something can't be done or that it's stupid or whatever they say to make themselves feel better but there is a long history of people who have become successful because they believed and they never gave up. All I ask is for a chance to show you that hard work and determination can culminate into something great. Thank you for your time and consideration.

Short summation of the film-
Off the coast of Florida lies a small atoll known as Temple Island. Life for it's citizens is ordinary, that is until one morning an emergency call goes out. It reaches the highest levels of the US Government. A team of highly trained Marines is dispatched to investigate. 
What they uncover is both shocking and unbelievable. What happened to the islands inhabitants? Why were they sent? More importantly... Will they come back?
The Undead Conspiracy takes you on a roller coaster thrill ride. The team will be tested, loyalties will be tested. In the end the team must work together to survive an enemy more deadly then the Undead hordes!

Footballinclusive.com is THE all-in-one reference site for football fans, the ultimate tool providing access to an outstanding experience through a unique database of football facts updated daily.
On Footballinclusive, football passion comes to life through:
- knowledge and data. Research and discover.
- sharing and social interaction. Contribute and support.
In one location and at the touch of a button, fans can find and contribute: results, statistics, videos, club information, player information... They build the experience and share their football likes, dislikes, and analyses, giving life to a groundbreaking collective memory. All information contributed to the site is processed and checked prior to going live. After it goes live, the information can be challenged at any time in order to ensure it is 100% accurate, reliable, and fully detailed.
Fans are always wondering about a player, a score, a statistic. And the solution is invariably the same: look it up via a search engine and cross your fingers you’ll find a website with the answer. On Footballinclusive, you will not only find your answer, you’ll also find yourself at the heart of a free and limitless database where you can delve even deeper.
Footballinclusive is the source, the answer, the reference, created for the fans, by the fans.
Let Julien and Lorenzo show you how Footballinclusive works:
PLAY

To help Footballinclusive grow, we need YOU! Check out our unique prizes, created exclusively for our Kickstarter campaign. You won’t find them anywhere else. Kind of like looking for a British player in Arsenal's 2005 roster…
 To see a large format posters, click here: http://bit.ly/21BDLzn
Footballinclusive is a new way to live and breathe football online. Research, find, and relive your favorite football moments, share your memories, ideas, or impressions and support your favorite team! 
Use our 100% football search engine and find all associated fixtures with a statistical summary for each. For example, you can research:
a fixture: Manchester vs Liverpool
a club: Paris Saint-Germain
a player: Zinédine Zidane
a score: all games in history decided by an 7-1 score
a competition: Serie A
a goal: all matches in which Messi scored
braces recorded by a given player: all braces recorded by Ronaldinho
a club + a score: Juventus 3-0
a club against a pool of rivals: FC Bayern München vs french clubs
a club against a player: all of CR7’s matches against Barça ...
Each result provides you with:
- a statistical summary of your search
- a home/away/neutral venue filter
- the ability to navigate by scrolling or via the timeline
plus club logos that change automatically based on the year researched.
Watch the videos or highlights to relive matches, and click on club/player links to delve even deeper into football history!
 Then go to the detailed match report where you can check out lineups, tactical formations, together with video highlights, and participate in the match discussion: your best memories, your first time at the stadium, your match analysis… At long last a place where we can relive the match together!
 Interested in knowing everything about a given player? His training academy team, his nickname, contract year, social media handles, career moves, transfer fees, stats…
 Whether it be mythical or defunct clubs, you can access all of their history: awards and records, roster every season, logo and kit changes…
Rediscover any competition, match day after match day, and relive any match in its context with table standings at kickoff.
 Let Footballinclusive guide you through historic matches:
- legendary matches
- incredible scores
- most researched by users
The more you contribute, the more the database grows! Every detail counts…because we know matches are often decided on details. Highly precise details. That is why each contribution is checked before entering the database, in order to ensure the highest level of accuracy. We all make mistakes, just ask Arconada. Which is why you will always be able make further contributions to improve the information and complement the database. Web trolls are inevitable, so after 3 bad contributions that user’s account will be blocked. He or she can continue using Footballinclusive, however all of his or her points will be forfeited.
We have already gathered 300 contributors to help launch Footballinclusive. History is in the making!
Example of a match report to fill out:
Easily locate matches in need of contributions per competition and per season:
You rack up points for every contribution you make, so you can become the best independent contributor or your favorite team's top contributor.
 Fans, express yourselves!!! Pick your favorite club, player, coach, and matches to help them climb the charts. We want to give you a voice so the site can generate its own unique statistics, unprecedented rankings, and trends: which clubs are most popular among football fans, which players are considered most emblematic to Manchester fans, which matches are AC Milan fan favorites, or how do Chelsea fans rank their favorite coaches (and the list is long…)!
On their profile page, fans can support their favorite club, country, player, or coach. On Footballinclusive, one user = one vote, and “likes” are limited. You can also pick 5 favorite matches! But don’t worry, you can always change your mind if you want… So, Messi or CR7? Brazil or Argentina? Real Madrid or Barça? City / United or Juve / Milan? Mourinho or Guardiola?
We will also create our own site-based rankings and tables every week/month/year, per country and continent, such as:
- top players per position
- top European, South American, African players…
- top rookies
- best matches
- best goals ...
For the fans, by the fans.
Our goal is to raise 55k€ in order to guarantee the site will remain operative for two years and to introduce new competitions on a regular basis: mainly the Big 5 of Europe, starting with France’s Ligue 1, then the Liga BBVA (Spain), followed by the Barclay’s Premier League (England), the Serie A TIM (Italy) and, finally, the Bundesliga (Germany).
If we exceed our goals, we will be able to further expand our database by offering access to even more competitions and translate the site into Spanish, German, Portuguese, Greek, Russian, Turkish, or even Mandarin! We will also be able to expand to regional or amateur competitions.
Note: For each new competition introduced, data from the past two seasons will be available at launch.

UPDATE (21st Oct): Master Diluc and Fischl, the Prinzessin der Verurteilung tiers are now available for backing!
Master Diluc and Fischl, the Prinzessin der Verurteilung join INKCRAFT 2020! They are both drawn at 2x the usual size of my other InkCraft artworks. And for the first time, I used metallic-gold ink to help accent the effects in the artwork. I am really pleased with how they turned out!

The original Fischl, the Prinzessin der Verurteilung has found a home already. However, Master Diluc is still seeking a warm and loving home and is available as a reward tier.  As this is the original drawing, there will only be 1 of it available.

We received numerous requests for prints of Master Diluc and Fischl, the Prinzessin der Verurteilung. I did not want to make the usual art prints as they wouldn't be able to bring out the pretty effects created by the metallic-gold ink accents. We spoke with our awesome production team and are currently working with them to create special prints with metallic-gold ink to reproduce the shimmer effect on the original art. These are available on this Kickstarter as a new reward tier, or as an add-on, should you wish to stick to your existing tier but want these prints as well.

I hope you enjoy both Master Diluc and Fischl, the Prinzessin der Verurteilung as much as I did when creating them. Thank you for your support and love!
- Stay Creative,
Rachta

 In late 2019, Rachta started on INKCRAFT - an artbook containing the complete collection of her drawings during the month of October. It was launched together with her Artist Journey to a huge success.
However, we felt that we wanted to share more. Like her Artist Journey, we didn't want INKCRAFT to be just an artbook. We want to recreate the experience one has while watching Rachta draw in-person. Hearing the pen nib's scratches; watching each individual lines get drawn out; seeing the colors fill the empty spaces, these are the sights and sounds that we want to share with you in INKCRAFT 2020.
 Rachta is currently realizing her dream of bringing her world to reality through her manga. when taking a break from creating gripping stories and breathtaking scenes, Rachta would often be found sketching her favorite pop culture characters. She enjoys baking and hunting for the world's best pancakes during her free time. 
Oct: Drawing artworks & ISBN book registration 
Oct: Writing & Editing the book
Nov: Editing & Designing the book      
Dec: Production 
Jan: Mailing of Backer Rewards!
INKCRAFT 2020 is thoroughly thought out to feature high-quality materials while still maintaining shipping efficiency. The team learns from experience and we are always on the lookout for ways to lower logistic costs for you. All Supporter Rewards are shipped from Singapore via registered mail with tracking. 
Images are for illustration purposes only. The final product might differ from the images shown.

About the project re-launch...
As some of you might also be aware, I've previously attempted to get this project funded about six months ago. At the time, the project was listed with a much higher goal as well. The project was unsuccessful for a few reasons but I think it was probably because I didn't do a good enough job promoting the book itself and showing potential new readers what they can expect of the book.
This forced me to go back to the drawing board and try to tackle the project from a few different angles. The primary one that's allowed me to relaunch with for a much smaller goal is that I've found a different printer that could provide the books at a significantly lower cost than my initial printer, without compromising any quality. Based on the samples that I was provided, I believe that the quality is even better than my original one.
I've also decided to try to provide a different variety of rewards and researched different manufacturers to find the best price to get these new rewards done.
And lastly, I also took the time to save some of my own money to pay for a larger portion of the print run myself.
All this allowed me to significantly lower the project goal and a completely redesigned project page and video will hopefully allow you all to get a much better sense of what to expect from Brainslug: Alien Tongues.
Andre

Once upon a time, I was a working Irish musician. For years, I toured up and down the east coast (with my former band-mates in Ft. Lauderdale's "James's Gate" and Boston's "Hiring Fair") playing in packed pubs and festivals from Miami to Maine. But three kids and the war in Afghanistan interrupted my plans. It's time to change that and get back in the saddle. It's time for a real solo project, focusing on my three favorite things: Love, Whiskey, and Rebellion -- but not necessarily in that order.
Those three kids cost a ton of cash, and without a record label, I don't have the funds to manufacture those pretty little silver discs. That's where you come in. Every little bit helps, and every little bit goes to the manufacture of my CDs, licensing three or four songs that are not original or in the public domain, and some VERY limited marketing.
Every level of rewards includes a copy of the music!
The good folks at DiscMakers.com are standing by to print these once I'm done recording. My goal is to have the disc ready to go for St. Patrick's Day, a tight but achievable schedule.
You can hear three of my original songs as recorded by "Hiring Fair" at  https://www.facebook.com/IrishSoldierBoy/app_178091127385, and I'm also crowdsourcing some of the LWR content there as well. You can also suggest songs for the project through Twitter, @IrishSoldierBoy.
Hope to see you at the pub!

SUCCESS!! 
Thanks everyone for making the Runners Volume 1: Bad Goods Kickstarter campaign a great success!! It was a bit of a nail-biter for a little bit, but the campaign rallied in the last several days to end strong. Thanks for all the pledges and especially the kind words of support for the series. It's been a while since the last book, so it's great to know fans are still excited for more, and more is certainly coming!
I'll be finishing the coloring of Volume 1 over the next few months, and then it's on to Volume 3!! Visit runnersuniverse.com and sign up for the mailing list to be notified when the new story arc starts posting later in 2018!
For anyone who missed the campaign, you can order the new color edition of Runners Volume 1: Bad Goods, as well as Volume 2: The Big Snow Job, from my runnersuniverse.com Store. Both books are available in PDF, paperback, and hardcover (limited quantities) editions. A limited number of reward items, like prints and character cards, will also be available.
And I'll see you all at runnersuniverse.com for Volume 3!! Thanks again!!
UPDATES:
Update 5-30-18: International Shipping Bonuses: I know international shipping costs are a bit of a deterrent. Paying $24 shipping for a single book is a real gut-punch. I can’t do anything about the cost, but I'd like to make that bitter pill a little easier to swallow. So for international backers, I will make this offer: back the campaign at either the Vol 1 Paperback Signed level ($25) or the Vol 1 Hardcover Signed level ($30), and I will automatically include the 3 prints and 7 character cards FOR FREE during fulfillment! So you'll be paying around $50, including the shipping, but at least you'll get the $50 tier of rewards. I hope this takes some of the sting off of the high shipping costs. (Unfortunately, I can’t extend this offer to pledges for both books, since the two books alone comes out to 3 lb, but the extras would push the weight into the 4 lb cost.) 
"Aliens, Smugglers, Pirates. And they're the GOOD guys."
Hi there! I'm Sean Wang and I've worked as a writer and artist on comics like Tick and Arthur (New England Comics) and Meltdown (Image Comics). But I'm best known for my creator-owned sci-fi series Runners...
Runners is a fun sci-fi action comedy about a crew of alien smugglers led by reluctant captain Roka Nostaco and his acerbic co-pilot Ril Mar. They're joined by two pirates, jokey sharpshooter Cember Koji and former mob enforcer Bennesaud. There's Bocce, a humanoid with a shape-shifting energy arm, and Sky, a mysterious alien girl with some unusual powers of her own. The series follows their exploits as they struggle to complete hazardous intergalactic runs while constantly hounded by pirates, bounty hunters, police, and the occasional conscience.   
Runners Vol 1: Bad Goods, originally came out as a black-and-white book to much critical acclaim. It focuses on one particular run for the mob that spirals out of control, including shootouts with pirates, dogfights with bounty hunters, and an all-out, three-way ship, cycle, and foot chase through the streets of an alien space station.
Old b&w Runners Vol 1: Bad Goods
It was followed by Runners Vol 2: The Big Snow Job, which found the crew taking on a seemingly trivial job on a frozen planet that turned out to be more than they bargained for, forcing them to deal with a hostile native population, a band of evil mercenaries, a mob power play, and a series of treacherous double-crosses. Like Volume 1, it received excellent reviews, but unlike the first book, the second was in full color.
Runners Vol 2: The Big Snow Job
To fit the new and ongoing aesthetic of the series, I am now going back and coloring Volume 1, and I’m hoping comic and sci-fi fans will help me fund the printing of the book here on Kickstarter. 
This new version of an old favorite will consist of:
Paperback or Kickstarter exclusive hardcover
176 pages, with the entire story newly colored
The very first 7-page short story
Sketchbook pages
Bonus content new to the color edition
Runners Vol 1: Bad Goods paperback or hardcover, unsigned or signed with head sketch
Set of three 8”x10” Vol 1 prints
Set of seven 4"x6" Vol 1 Character Cards
8"x10" inked portrait and toned-paper commission
11"x17" inked commission of entire crew
Original Art: cover (11"x17") and all 7 character card illustrations (8"x10")
And these are the reward tiers:
Shipping will be added to reward tiers based on country during checkout. Unfortunately, international shipping is very expensive and there isn’t really anything I can do about that. But I do ship worldwide if you are willing to pay the shipping. Remember: digital files are always an option in those cases to avoid international shipping costs, and digital versions of both volumes are available!
The following additional items can be added on to reward tiers:
See sample pages from Snow Job Sketchbook
See larger image of Snow Job Battle Royale print
I did the first two books in my spare time, which made it hard to really build momentum. I am now planning to do the series full-time until the entire story is told. At this point I have plotted out the entire remainder of the series, including every major plot turn and character arc.
Runners story wall for Vol 3-10
Additionally, Volume 3 is already fully scripted and ready to go (after a concepting phase). New pages will start posting on runnersuniverse.com later in 2018. I have a LOT more planned for the series and will be producing it on a much more regular and consistent schedule going forward.
If you're still on the fence, please check out the series at www.runnersuniverse.com, where both books are available in webcomic form. And here are a few quotes from comic professionals and reviewers:
"Runners is the best science fiction adventure I have read in years. It has wonderfully fleshed out characters, a terrific story, and great action sequences." --Stan Sakai; Usagi Yojimbo
"Runners is a truly fun and beautifully illustrated alien rag-tag space smuggler comic that feels as comforting as any of your favorite sci-fi-mythos while still being something unique in its own galaxy frontier." -- David Petersen; Mouse Guard
"Sean Wang's impressive art demonstrates the glorious imagination and colorful detail you want in a science fiction adventure. His exotic aliens make for a visual feast. If the Star Wars cantina customers took on Firefly-like mercenary jobs, you'd have Runners." --Johanna Draper Carlson; www.comicsworthreading.com
"One of the best comic book universes doesn’t belong to DC, Marvel or even Archie… it belongs to Sean Wang’s incredible series, ‘Runners’!" Since I first read the original, I have championed 'Runners' as the best independent comic ever produced. It's beautifully drawn and written with so much passion and charm." -- Matt Herring; www.secretidentitypodcast.com
Thanks for checking out my Kickstarter page and I hope you'll consider supporting Runners Vol 1: Bad Goods IN COLOR!!

DEANNA: I get chased in my dreams... Sometimes every night. There were times when I thought it was over. But it wasn't ...

Deanna is a young woman who just wants to live her life like anyone else, but for years something from her past is haunting her, leaving her restless and devastated. She is experiencing horrific nightmares in which she’s been followed by an unknown presence hiding in the dark. Deanna is trying so hard to lead her life back to normality, to get out of this state of persisting paranoia but soon finds out that the events in her nightmares aren’t just dreams. Her boyfriend Ryan is eager find out what’s been bothering her for so long. But is he really prepared for the horror that awaits him?...
DEANNA: It's like whenever I'm happy(looks deeply in Ryans eyes)
-it starts all over again... 
Screenplay and Storyboard
We´re independent filmmakers from Cologne, Germany, currently studying and teaching Film at the Macromedia University and the Akademie Deutsche Pop. Throughout the last year we put so much effort into writing, discussing and planning this movie that it’s became a true project of the heart. Inspired by the human fear, author and director Toni Stintzing developed a thrilling screenplay about going through the horror of dealing with a dreadful experience. Now it is ready to get adopted into an amazing short film (that will keep it‘s audience clinched to their seats). To create this project in a manner that lives up to our ideas, we need your help! So JOIN us and make this project happen ;)
The Main Crew behind "The Follower"
Toni Stinzing (top left) is the creative mind of our film project. Using inspiration from biographical experience and observing important topics of our time, he developed the screenplay and takes on the role of the Director, which is no problem since Toni is a passionate person, constantly working on films with an overview of all the departments. In his freetime Toni gained popularity as a fitness professional. 

As a graduated graphic designer André Becker (top mid) is able to undertake all kinds of creative compositions, starting from filming, illustrating, designing, editing, drawing to animating stunning 3D-Objects. As a camera operator he already produced music videos and award-winning short films, that captivate the audience by their unique approach. His passion for art and filming is inimitable for his job as our Director of Photography and once he committed to a project, he’s willing to give it his all." 

Our Camera Operator is not only a videographer for high quality fashioncollections and musicians, but Pasindu Goldmann (top right) is also a popular DJ, going by the name of „Schooki“. He’s a very open minded, optimistic person and it doesn’t matter which creative field Pasindu takes on, he’s always capable of giving things a unexpected touch.

Gregory Hegel (bottom left) combines the characteristic of being professional and passionate and he's also warmhearted and loyal. In addition to his study of film he also starred as an actor in a feature film production and convinced as an empathic and talented person. So who else should have been our Assistent Director.

To create a film you need the help of someone who is capable of organizing - Whether it is finances, locations or human resources. Mitti Nghiem (bottom mid) is the right woman for the job of the Producer, because of her diligence and conscientious. But nevertheless working with her is never boring, since her joyful spirit and honest passion for filmmaking is always noticeable.

Music is Maciej Kuleszas (bottom right) preferred means of expression. And he’s well aware of the mediums power. The young creative from Warsaw knows exactly when to go big, but he’s also able to give the film space when it’s needed. His work is never cluttered rather subversive and authentic. We are very grateful to call him a part of our team.
Check out his latest Video:

Of course that is not everybody. There are also people for light/grip, audiorecording, assistants and other helping hands!

Everybody from the crew voluntarily works on this project, except Maciej because we want to support him!
Why do we need your help?
We're all students, but it is a personal project and therefore it is not related to any task for university. Which means we have to organize a whole lot and work things out to make it happen on a very low budget.
What happens If the project gets funded?

Thanks to you we can:
rent proper gear
rent locations
pay our actors!
pay festival fees
make a great film together with you!
For more info: http://thefollower-shortfilm.com

Music is a commodity that is consumed almost every moment of every day. Yet there is no professional service that helps musicians understand how to enter the industry and promote their work.  
  PROJECT SUMMARY:
Desi Music Entertainment, LLC is a startup California-based record label (or "artist-incubator") that aims to cultivate, nurture, and promote independent Indian artists world-wide. We need enough capital to launch 10 artists in 2015 - which will culminate in a compilation album set to release in early 2016. 
Funds earned from Kickstarter backers will not only go towards creating this album, but also towards "incubating" the artists. Each artist will receive tutorials on self-promotion, marketing and social media plus photo shoots, music production, music video production and international digital distribution.  
Without the community's support, this album won't happen!
BACKGROUND (Video transcript)
I have been formally studying and/or teaching music for 27 years. I started working for Oscar-winning composer A.R. Rahman 6 years ago to help set up his conservatory. And for the past decade, I’ve performed in concerts around the world, I’ve conducted the KMMC chamber choir for the In Memoriam segment of the 2012 OSCARS, I’ve sung in scores of Bollywood films, and I was awarded the TED fellowship for being an entrepreneur and pioneer in music.
But about a year ago, I was like “wait a minute.” Life is short! and there’s a fire in my heart that wants more. So when I was thinking about what direction I wanted to go in, I started looking for services that would mold me as an artist and composer and teach me the basics of music marketing, promotion, and social media plus help me with the actual production of my work.
The problem is, it doesn’t exist. Why is there no service that provides artists with basic guidance to help them accomplish what they want to do in life?
Introducing, Desi Music Entertainment. The concept of DME lies somewhere between a music business university program/record label/artist management company. We are what you’d call an “artist incubator” and we will sit down with the artist and discuss what their dream is and come up with a strategy on how to get there - sort of like a college prep company that kids use to get into university. Our services include concept creation & strategy, photo shoot, social media tutorials, basics in music promotion and marketing plus the actual production of their music, mastering by Universal studios, production of their music video, and online distribution. I know what you're thinking - It's a LOT! But the basic concept is - when the artist has one company that's holding their hand through this long process, it’s not only cost effective, it takes way less time, and they end up with one cohesive public identity that sets the tone for the rest of their career.
The best part is, we won’t own the copyright of their work.
As an experiment, I wrote, directed and produced a track called Solidarity Song featuring well-known Bollywood and Kollywood artists to generate interest in the company and to celebrate India’s Independence Day. The response was unbelievable.
The videos have accumulated 40,000 views across platforms, inquiries from potential clients have been pouring into my inbox, hundreds of people have liked and/or subscribed to our Youtube and FB pages, and artists across India have expressed interest in our services.
And that’s where you come in!
I need enough startup capital to launch the musical careers of 10 ARTISTS IN 2015!
By backing this company, you are not only going to receive great rewards like limited edition cds or participate in live recording sessions, you are helping this dream come to life. 
LET'S START A REVOLUTION.
HOW AM I GOING TO PULL THIS OFF and WHY?
During my time spent in India (for the past 6 years) I have personally seen a huge upswing in the number of music schools that have popped up all over the country. This development is parallel to the dramatic growth of the Indian middle class over the last decade.  The BBC predicts that the Indian middle class will reach an astonishing 475 million by 2030.  
Information from BBC.CO.UK
Simultaneously, the number of young people that are choosing music as a career path is increasing every year.  With that said, where are these youth supposed to go after their education? 
Currently:
There are exponentially more musicians than there are professional avenues to take or infrastructure in place for artists to consider•  Bollywood-oriented record label giants like SONY and T Series are hardly interested in independent music and rarely take the time and money to represent and nurture indie artists.
There are only a handful of theatre companies to aspire to get into - most of them unpaid.
There are hardly any venues or theaters that showcase indie artists.  In fact, there are astonishingly fewer performance venues than there are performers.
Getting a job in music after college is extremely rare. Most people drop out of the music business and choose a more "stable" profession - even the most gifted musicians.
SO WHAT IS THE ANSWER?
DME!  Desi Music Entertainment will provide talented musicians a legitimate avenue to take after graduating from music school that will promote their music worldwide and set them on the right track. 
Step 1: Our team will offer workshops to music colleges, universities, and conservatories across the country as a supplementary program that focuses on music marketing, promotion, PR, social media marketing, image, and public identity.
Step 2: Students will continue on to the production of their work including recording, programming, mixing and mastering of their single or album.  This package includes production of a music video as well.  This includes digital distribution and live gigs.
Step 3: DME Is tying up with San Francisco Bay Area startup MODERN BEATS which focuses on concert series' that promotes Indian artists.  The clients who achieve an exceptional amount of views or engagement may have the opportunity to perform in the US through Modern Beats.  *Conditions apply
DME PREMIERE
Artists who are already well-known in the Hollywood, Bollywood and Kollywood industries will be featured and promoted through DME PREMIERE. All artists, big or small deserve to be represented! 
Solidarity Song - watch it here!
 If you have any questions about this project, don't hesitate to ask!

It's pretty simple really. I would like to publish a young adult short story on Amazon Kindle and I need help with the funds to cover the cost of a cover illustration. Cover illustrations are important when it comes to attracting readers. I have found a very talented illustrator who can create a compelling cover for my short story "Pimples and Puppies."
What is my short story about, you ask? Well, this is a young adult short story with the theme of learning to be more understanding of others. Something that seems to be in short supply among adults these days. I wrote it in 2014 and it was published on the Alfie Dog Fiction site for a couple of years; however, I did not promote it at that time. Now I would like to get it published to generate interest and a following for its future expansion into a novella. 
Having had pets all my life, I know the power of their love and companionship. They can bring out the best in people and they can bring people together. In the short story and in the novella to follow, three characters who go to the same school but do not run in the same social circles come to find common ground and a better understanding of one another through their love of dogs. Pets make our lives better with their loving spirits, and our appreciation and love of them in turn brings out the best in us. 
With the short story and the novella to follow, the P & P project, I will share characters striving to be better humans with the help of their furry friends. 
Campaign ends Friday, March 23rd.
"We are all travelers in the wilderness of this world, and the best we can find in our travels is an honest friend." ~ROBERT LOUIS STEVENSON

A while back in 2008-09 I started visiting forums, I was new in this world by that time. Then I got kicked out for 6 months and from that experience was born a new journey for me. I started my own Forum.
It is really tough to start a new forum without much money to back it up. 
I got into creating mods for vBulletin, I was fascinated with an idea to bringing together users from many forums since I had accounts in many forums and friends on each of them, then I wanted to create a medium point where we could hang out and at the same time, I wanted to help other forum owners to overcome with the problems that new forum faces (lack of active users) 
I did proof of concept (at least to myself) that IT IS possible. Here in this thread: http://www.vbulletin.org/forum/showthread.php?t=219697
I didn't have a clear idea on what to do next. I got up to 11 forums using my mod, I was getting a LOT of traffic to my site by that time (One Million Forum Profiles)  and I was alone coding the entire project. I got burned out due to many request for improving the idea and with no money to pay to other programmers to help me. I was like 48 hours in front of the computer.
It was for me a tough but a great achievement. I did implement it and many people liked the concept. 
Now, about 7 years later, I am working in a kind of the same concept, but with fully functional idea to solve REAL problems for Internet Users, websites, blogs and forums. And I am talking about spam all over websites and lack of reputation across websites.
This service is free for use on blogs, forums, websites, apps etc... And they  would die to use it as the best anti-spam tool ever.
Another real good point about our system for websites, blogs and forums, Any NonFakeUser member would be able to help you to report spam withing your forum or blogs without needing to be a member of your website. This is what i call a truly self cleaning environment. (this would be an optional tool at your disposal) Imagine a collaborating environment like this ;) 
There are other solutions like reCAPTCHA, StopForumSpam and others, but NON of them are capable of fixing the real problem(HUMAN SPAMMERS) There is a huge market for our product/service Almost every blog or forum would use our api.
NonFakeUsers.com will address to prevent spam by 99.9% with a free to use API.
In Other words. There is NOT an existing System yet that addresses those problems with a 99.9% success rate as we plan to do.
NonFakeUsers API
Developers would be able to build new applications, plugins,  mods, products and services on top of our system
And very important. We will not be dealing with private data other than your email.
On top of that, we got on paper and well planned the first Global Reputation System that will revolutionize how people trade/buy/sell all over the internet (a system kind of the one of ebay, but they still get short)
Where is the Money?
Where Is The Money?
But "nada" of this can be done without funds, I encourage you to help this project to come to life in the name of ALL internet Users like you and me. 
Sincerely...
Miguel Fernandez(Mike30)
