The Need for Halloween
My name is Kyle T. Hardin. I am a proud Orlando resident who loves how my city turns upside-down for every holiday. Halloween, though; will always be my favorite.  Believe it or not, I used to hate all things spooky and scary. Going to haunt events like Howl-O-Scream and Halloween Horror Nights started to change the way I saw horror. Many years later it is what I live and breathe every day. With the world hurting from Covid-19, it seemed Halloween was going to take a hard hit... and it did. 
I decided with the cancellation of so many Halloween offerings; I need to create my own! I always go all out decorating the inside of my house but this project is so far from anything I've ever done. I have designed a full entertainment experience! This isn't just a haunted house- this is something super unique and I can't wait to bring it to fruition! 
Things aren't easy for anyone right now, I know that. But amidst the chaos we could all use a little more of things we love. So if you are like me, and crave a haunted experience each Fall, than I would love for you to consider helping support this project. I have SO MANY ideas that I am so excited to work on. I will also make sure the event is as safe as possible. We will have only private groups, extensive post-group cleaning, and socially distant scares. Additionally; any supporter will be able to come and experience the haunt in person when it opens. I hope it'll make you proud!
The P.R.I.D.E Experience
I have worked with friends and family to conceptualize an 8-scene haunted house I will construct in my own home. The plan is to build full walls to create a path for the guests. In a completely focused and creative eye we hope to transport you through incredibly detailed environments. A haunted mansion to a dollhouse to a graveyard... We can't wait to use the support from you all to create and present The P.R.I.D.E. Experience:
You have been invited to a top secret, first of its kind journey into a new world. P.R.I.D.E. is the Practice and Research of Inter-Dimensional Exploration. Our team has found a new tear in the rift located in the living room of an Orlando man's home. After years of exploring the many worlds that have opened up through this portal we are ready to bring in our curious supporters. We will make sure you are safe and prepared for all the wonders and challenges these world hold This will be an exclusive event held only for those invited by P.R.I.D.E. Will that be you? Will you join the exploration and step into the unknown? 
More information on our website TheHardinHaunt.com

Hello Everybody,

I'll start with a quick introduction.

My name is David Beverley, and I'm an indie filmmaker. Over the last few years I have worked my way through a number of short films/online commercials. I've worked as a runner/camera operator/producer and now fortunately as a producer/director.
 As of right now, I'm half way through the shoot on my new romance/horror short called 'Catherine'.  
'Catherine tells the beautiful yet tragic story about how a young woman has driven herself into the ground struggling to keep her dark past a secret from the world and how she must now set aside all she has known to fight and keep the man she has fallen in love with. But can she keep her past away from him?'

After 3 years at SCAD, now is finally the time that I get to put together my senior capstone project to showcase the skills I've gained through my experience here! Over these last few years, I've taken a variety of classes, traveled around the world, and gained work experience through a number of different positions, and am ready to start on this incredible project that I feel so passionate about- "She Is..." a mock magazine for Kate Spade New York.
Kate Spade New York is a lifestyle brand through and through, and it only makes sense to have a source of inspiration for those who love the brand as much as I do where they can see everything the brand is inspired by, as well as tips, tricks, and ideas that can help them to live life the Kate Spade way.
This is where the birthplace for this project comes in. Enter "She Is...", a full lifestyle magazine dedicated to showing off every aspect of the lifestyle Kate Spade exudes. Filled to the brim with beautiful imagery, inspiring articles, and new ideas, this magazine serves to inspire those who read it, and to make life just a bit more colorful. The name is based off of two things- first being the famous phrase "She is quick, curious, playful, and strong" that Kate Spade lives by, as well as the latest coffee table book, "She", which showcases women from throughout history that have inspired us and made a lasting impact on the world.
The Kate Spade girl is fearless, is always prepared for a dinner party, and never leaves the house without at least a hint of sparkle. She is bold, witty, classic, and feminine. She isn't defined by her age or race, and she certainly doesn't take "no" as an answer. This magazine is for the Kate Spade girl, and those who identify with the brand and the message to "Live Colorfully" and "Share Joy".
This is where I need YOUR help! I have about 6 weeks to make this crazy dream a reality, and I am so excited to collaborate with some incredible people to make this all come to life. 
I intend on doing multiple photo shoots with product, as well as featuring a few ads for companies that Kate Spade relates to within the magazine. Most of this project will be a collaborative effort, and making sure I have the funds available to secure the right props, feed my crew while on set, travel to locations as needed, and ensure proper printing quality for the physical editions are crucial to creating this project.
Thank you so much for taking the time to read through this! I am so excited to get started, and I truly thank you for your support.

Punk Rock Coloring and Activity Book by Chain Assembly
In 2018 I bought a coloring book from Magnus Fredriksen, and the illustrations within blew me away. I was unable to color the pages because I was too worried about ruining something so beautiful. I therefore decided to make my own. 
It was late 2018 when I began work on my first coloring book, which used photos from disc golf tournaments I had taken over the years. It was a huge success and was sold to many disc golf stores around the country. With that project completed, I wanted to move onto a new subject dear to me. 
Since I caught the photography bug, I've been taking countless portraits of the many interesting and exciting people I see walking the streets of the different Tampa Bay cities I frequent using my Olympus E-M5. These illustrations are all made from original photos. I wanted to honor these peoples' aesthetics in a coloring book so that all the exciting colors they wear can be further explored and varied.
At the time of writing this, I've completed 31 pages, six of which are activities. I have another 10 photos I want to include as illustrations. I intend the book to have at least 30 pages, but it looks like it will have 40-50 before this kickstarter project is over. I will keep my camera at the ready until the book is sent off to the printer in case anyone else catches my attention.
To create the illustrations, I'm using a combination of Autodesk Sketchbook, Clip Studio Pro, Adobe Photoshop, and Adobe Indesign.
Once the kickstarter project ends, a survey will be sent out to collect your mailing addresses. The digital copy will be sent via a google drive link.
Chain Assembly, the brand I use for all of my art, illustrations, and graphic design, is an entity that I've been nurturing since 2016. Through it I've designed many logos, I've become a stable source of custom illustrations and design for the Florida Disc Golf Scene, and I've shown in many galleries and museums throughout the United States. You can follow Chain Assembly @Chainassembly on Instagram, Facebook, and at www.chainassembly.com
Thank you for looking at this project and helping me to get it into your hands.
-Nick Ribera

New York in Quarantine – a photo book for charity
When NYC emerged as a pandemic hotbed, rooftops became our only respite from cramped apartments; our only escape into the outside world. Since the beginning of quarantine, I have spent hundreds of hours photographing the rise of roof culture from my rooftop in Bushwick, Brooklyn.
I'm creating New York in Quarantine to memorialize the hope, beauty, and eccentricity of New Yorkers persevering through this difficult moment in history. This will be a 96-page, 9x12" photo book with over 70 images and several essays chronicling the unique rooftop microcosm through quarantine.
Every building has a different journey to its rooftop. Some have swanky elevators with ‘roof deck’ buttons while others have rickety fire escape ladders. Even for the most perilous ascents, I’ve seen elaborate barbecues – grill and all – hauled up via graceful assembly line.
The writing in this book includes detailed, anthropological reflections on rooftop culture, observing and speculating on how my neighbors adapted to an intensive quarantine. I recount the heartwarming stories of socially distanced playdates, cross-rooftop flirtation, makeshift drag show runways, rooftop concerts, and so much more.
This project is a memento to my local community for entrusting me with documenting their lives through the pandemic. It also became the excuse I've always wanted to befriend my neighbors. While this photo series is 95% candid moments, I've gotten to know almost everyone photographed and have received permission to include their images in this book.
Fire escapes are the urban backyard and a defining architectural feature of NYC. If you’re lucky enough to have one, it’s probably your only private (but not secluded) outdoor space. While space is limited, New Yorkers make them work as dining rooms, reading nooks, art studios, and even drag show runways.
Here’s a look at the latest mockup for the table of contents.
100% of profits go to Doctors Without Borders 
To help raise funds to fight COVID-19 in the places that need them most, I'll be donating 100% of profits to Doctors Without Borders (Médecins Sans Frontières), whose work includes fighting COVID-19 through providing humanitarian medical care, medical training, and emergency response services in destabilized regions worldwide.
As per Kickstarter guidelines, which state that projects can't raise funds directly for charity, all contributions will be put towards designing, printing, and distributing this book. The profits from all post-Kickstarter book sales will then go directly to Doctors Without Borders.
To be 100% clear, I will personally be making no money from this project.
Marco was weeks away from opening his first restaurant when the pandemic struck, resulting in the prohibition of indoor dining. Despite the setback, Marco found countless moments of joy on his rooftop, flying kites, playing tag, and joyously twirling his dog and daughter in the air. Marco’s restaurant, The Royal Seafood Bar, is now open with outdoor dining and delivery.
 Projected to Ship by January 
The photo book is nearly completed. The entire series has been shot, edited, and laid out with the creative touch of talented designer Eddy Ymeri. Printing and distribution have already been arranged, and a final draft will be submitted to the printer by early November. Barring any production issues, the books will be shipping out to Kickstarter backers by January.
New York in Quarantine will be printed and bound in the U.S.
Many neighbors made a ritual of coming outside for the 7pm city-wide clap for front-line workers. On most nights, they would linger to appreciate the sunset over the city skyline.
People always want to be higher, climbing onto chimney tops, AC units, and staircase shafts for no apparent reason. It could be a simple thrill, a playful balancing act, or an extra layer of privacy from neighbors below. However, I like to think that this reflects New Yorkers’ simple desire to rise to the top.
 The Photographer 
Josh Katz is a photographer, photography teacher, and sponsored skateboarder living in Brooklyn, NY. He creates digital photography courses, leads workshops and makes videos for Canon, teaches Lightroom for Adobe, and shoots YouTube videos about photography. 
He has large audiences on YouTube and Instagram, which he’ll be leveraging to promote the photo book.
This video shares a behind-the-scenes look at his photographic process for this project, including the ethics of rooftop photography, his relationship with neighbors, and how he suspect quarantine changed New Yorkers' relationships with their rooftops.

Share this project on your Instagram story, email it to your family, or brow-beat your NYC-obsessed friends into preordering a copy. Every last bit makes a difference. Thank you for your unwavering support!
In a neighborhood full of transience, the few remaining pigeon coops found on Bushwick rooftops serve as a relic of old New York. I befriended this pigeon fancier who flies his 1,000 birds every day, rain or shine; he claims to love them more than his wife.

Six years ago, we joined this amazing community and you helped us launch our first collection of literary inspired t-shirts.  It’s been an incredible journey, requiring a lot of hard work and even more caffeine. We're the same team you've gotten to know over three previous campaigns, and we have something totally new to share with you!
We’ve been obsessed with cold brew for almost a decade now — even back when most cafes only served “iced coffee.” Despite our love for cold brew, we don't love the 10 minute walk to Starbucks, waiting another 10 minutes in line, and paying over $4 a cup. It's 2018! We can buy a mattress online. Why are we still drinking cold brew the old way? 
So, we took a step back and decided to imagine the perfect cold brew experience from the ground up. It would be a beautiful, effortless online experience where you could order high quality cold brew directly to your door, on your own schedule. It would be the tastiest, most convenient cold brew you've ever had.
We're back on Kickstarter because we need your help to fund our initial production run and bring Canary Cold Brew to life. We can't wait to get started, as each morning is a reminder of how much we personally want Canary in our own lives — and we think you might, too! 
We've collaborated with dozens of industry experts to create a variety of incredible cold brew blends.  It all starts with organic, fair trade beans.  Next, the beans are roasted to perfection — light enough to bring out the bean's natural flavors, but just dark enough to give you a smooth and chocolatey taste that lingers after the initial kick. After that, we use techniques like nanoscale filtration in our brewing process to bring out all the right notes. The end result is a smooth, pure, high-quality coffee.
We're also excited to be able to produce in small batches, so that we can continually innovate with specialty beans from around the world to create new blends for you. And by being a part of our early process, you'll be able to shape the future of your coffee by sending us detailed feedback on what you'd like to see in our next blends. By backing us now, you’ll be able to play a major role in creating the perfect cold brew blends.  
We've thought long and hard about how to use 21st century technology to bring our ideal coffee routine to life.  Here's what it can mean for you:
Fair Weather Fan.  Maybe you’re a “summer-only” cold brew drinker. We happen to drink it year round, but we want you to have a delivery schedule that caters to you — so you can set it and forget it. We'll even send you an email alert the week before the first 70 degree day in your city or town so your fridge is ready to go for cold brew season.  
Get Back on Track. If you've been a little bit too generous in sharing your Canary with friends, you can have us send your next shipment ahead of schedule to make sure you don't run out. 
Pause Your Subscription.  Easily pause your subscription so nothing piles up while you’re on vacation. We won't give you more cold brew than you want — we'll tailor the experience to fit your exact needs. 
Mixing and Matching. Try new blends in your box. You’ve got your go-to Original Blend for mornings, but you’d like to try something new, too?  No problem!
Design New Blends. Because we produce in small batches, we're so excited to let our customers help us refine our formulas, experiment with new beans, and create new blends. We can't wait to see what you come up with.
Afternoon Blend. One thing we've heard in conversation is, “I love cold brew, but it's too much caffeine for me.”  We're incredibly excited to be launching with our Afternoon Blend, which has about half the caffeine as our original blend. We think it's perfect for a refreshing afternoon iced coffee that gives you a nice pick-me-up without keeping you awake all night. It's the same refreshing cold brew — without the jitters. 
Life's hard. Your cold brew should be easy.

On the east edge of Round Lake Beach, the old Super Pawn has sat empty for well over a year.  In that time, Black Lung Brewing has been an Alternating Proprietorship.  We were brewing in a shared space and distributing beer around the Chicago Suburbs, while looking for a home of our own.  It only makes sense that we would wind up back in Round Lake Beach, IL., where owners Josh & Sarah Grubbs started their family, lived and worked for a decade.  The old space is getting a new lease on life as we bring over our 5 bbl brew house and creative beer brewing ideas for a new brewery and taproom experience, in a town that greatly deserves it!  We plan to promote a fun craft beer atmosphere, where patrons will enjoy a plethora of worldly beers and some new home town favorites.  We will open a taproom where craft beer enthusiasts can learn about the craft of brewing and see some of the works in progress, while they enjoy a hand crafted brew, made with quality ingredients.  Beer, Grounded in Tradition, Inspired by Enthusiasm.  

Our journey started in a garage with a turkey burner, we are now in 50 retail locations! Help us get to the finish line on our new taproom!

Our goal is to raise a minimum of $15,000 in just a little over 6 weeks (by Dec 21st). So of course, we can’t do this without you! The way Kickstarter works is all or nothing. In order for us to receive the money we raise (and for you to get the awesome rewards we're offering), we MUST meet our goal.

Josh and Sarah started this brewery journey back in 2016. Sarah came up with the name, which comes from a song called Black Lung Heartache. It is reminiscent of the story of Josh's Grandpa, William Grubbs Sr.
The Brewmaster
Joshua Grubbs has had over 20 years in construction and the last five years homebrewing.  He has attended the Concise Course in Brewing at Siebel Institute, volunteered at local breweries and distributed his beer for a year.  Josh loves the delicacy of traditional beers and the inventiveness of newer styles.  He is an award winning homebrewer and is eager to serve his award winning brews in a taproom of his own.  Can't wait to see you in the taproom!

Now is YOUR chance to be an exclusive part of bringing the Black Lung Brewing Taproom to life during this final stretch before we open this winter … oh, and score some sweet rewards for doing so – check out the details below:

I love this town. As hokey, as corny, as simple as that sounds, it is the truth. I've been lucky enough to be involved in many a project focused on what makes Knoxville great. From KnoxBands, to Paperthin, to Knoxify, it's all been interesting.
The Eight Six Five looks to incorporate all the previous experiences, in addition to my general penchant for a lot of geekiness, and wrap them into a site devoted to Knoxville. We'll have a monthly podcast that will be a roundtable discussion on our fair city, we'll be sponsoring different First Friday galleries, and we'll be reporting on all things Knoxville. Currently, there are 17 folks that have offered to help out and write. I hope to have a new article every day of the work week (Monday-Friday), covering a multitude of subjects ranging from art to music to concerts to non-profits to transfers to wellness to DIY'ers to pets to community awareness to etc to etc to etc. Also aim to have at least one video feature month. The goal of the site is to marry great article content to good photography.
All money donated will be accounted for on the website, at a special link, where any one who donates can see how I spend every dime. My intention is not to make any money with this site. Anything sold (as in t-shirts) I plan on taking the money from that, picking a local non-profit, and donating the full amount.
The podcasting equipment, hosting and other fees are what's making me reach out to the community. Originally I was going to fund all aspects, but had many a friend saying they'd like to pitch in. Kickstarter is a great format to help bring folks together. Which is, at it's core, what The Eight Six Five is all about.

The over 20 years I've been working as an artist has been very "nomadic" for me. From graphic design to architectural illustrator to animator to concept art for video games and so on... all the while oil painting has been my passion. I love making marks with a brush! Stranger in a strange land, dark traveler, detectives, noir type occult work, one man against the odds, unlikely heroes - these are all themes that have interested me over the years. NOMADS will be filled with these ideas!
NOMADS is a collection of conceptual, character driven paintings, that were started as a way to realize and drive out a narrative for further storytelling projects. As the paintings were developed they eventually became known as "NOMADS" and as each painting was explored, they in turn helped to further define a story and characters for a graphic novel as well. (currently being worked on for a future release!) The NOMADS art book will be a limited run, 7"x7" 40 page hardcover book.
NOMADS Art Book
I need your help and support to make this book happen and want to take this opportunity to thank all of you that have enjoyed my work and have given me positive support over the years. Painting for me is such a solitary endeavor and I still get shocked when people show support. I would like to say I am forever grateful to be able to pursue my art for a living! This is something I could never do without your support. So again, thank you so much!

The Opportunity Presents Itself...
MIguel has landed a position at a winery where he manages all winemaking operations for various clients around Monterey County. The owner of this facility has been overly generous enough to allow Miguel the opportunity to create his own brand and utilize the equipment and space that is already in existence. Being the type of person that seeks a new adventure, Miguel has seized the moment and has began the process of becoming an established winery. Never having thought that this day would come so soon in his life, non-the-less, Miguel is ready to take on any challenges that are faced with owning a business.
The Plan...
Over the past seven months, Miguel has been filing for and obtaining all necessary permits and licenses legally required for operating a winery. The gears of this mechanism have been quietly turning, and all has finally been acquired. It has been a long and costly process, from the paperwork to the barrels needed to make wine. Currently, a few local restaurants have shown interest in carrying the Lepe Cellars brand and a website is in the works where those seeking to purchase can place their orders online. Everything is at his fingertips to make this dream a reality, but he still needs the help and support of friends, family and everyone else to aid in the production of the first major vintage. In the past, Miguel has been making small batches of wine, but the time has now come to make a bigger push to enter the market place and to satisfy the demand.
What Is Kickstarter?
Kickstarter is a new way to fund projects. Everyone using Kickstarter has complete control and responsibility over their project and at no given point is kIckstarter invloved with the development of a project. Project creators (Miguel) set a funding goal ($8,000) and deadline. If people like a project, they can pledge money to make it happen. Funding on Kickstarter is all-or-nothing — projects must reach their funding goals to receive any money. All-or-nothing funding might seem scary, but it’s amazingly effective in creating momentum and rallying people around an idea. To date, an impressive 44% of projects have reached their funding goals. Project creators also offer rewards to thank backers for their support. Ultimately, Kickstarter is only a tool to spread the word and Miguel will always and forever have 100% ownership of this project.
The Reason For Kickstarting...
Miguel's Kickstarter project is aiding in his financial need. Up until now, his funds have gone towards paying for the licenses and permits, legal fees, supplies, and taxes. And with the 2015 harvest coming up, he need's assistance in purchasing grapes to make the Lepe Cellars brand a reality. So why $8,000? This would allow for the purchase of enough grapes to produce a significant amount of wine to enter the local markets around Monterey County.
Your support for this endeavor is truly and greatly appreciated! As a friend and supporter, you will forever be rewarded with Lepe Cellars benefits. And for those that cannot visit the winery due to distance or time constraints, rewards can be negotiable.

A COLLECTION OF THE WORLD’S FAMOUS FAIRYTALES, TURNED INTO A FINANCIAL SETTING:
Kickstart a collection of some 20 short fairy tales set in the world of finance. Most are based on the narrative of the famous fairy tales of 1001 Arabian Nights, the Brothers Grimm, Hans Christian Andersen, Baron von Münchhausen etc.
FEATURED FAIRY TALES: 
A look inside: Al Alim Bank and the Magic App
Al Alim Bank and the Magic App
Black Monday and the Seven Crises
Sin-Bad the Bond Salesman
Little Red Account Balance (and The Big Bad Wolf of Wall Street)
Gullible’s Investments
Mario and Christine
Gordon Gekko and the Forty Tulip Investors
The Banker's New Repayment Structure
Baron von Bullmarkt's Incredible Investments
The Curing Touch of Midas Bank
Beauty and the Banker
The CEO and the Clerk
The Borrowers That Always Repaid Their Loans
The Merger That Offered True Synergies
The Insurance Policy That Always Paid Out
The Hedge That Covered Every Risk
The Decent Stock Broker
The News Channel That Provided All Inside Information
ENTERTAINING, WITH A TOUCH OF MORALE...
Whilst touching on various financial scams, crises and some other negative side effects that have resulted from finance, the book is mainly aimed to be entertaining, not moralising. Some real financial ‘fairy tales’ have become innovations that have made dreams come true, whilst others have remained castles in the sky.
However, as noted by the author of the foreword - a pioneer of the international hedge fund industry - I hope the stories will also be considered instructive.
Erik Vrij has spent a career that spans both finance and fiction. He has the knowledge and imagination to bring these two strange worlds together in a way that is both instructive and fun to read. Anyone reading his stories and thinks they are made up by the power of imagination will be surprised to know that they are well founded in reality and made accessible and enjoyable in the hands of a master story teller.
Ian Morley
Chairman, Wentworth Hall
Founder Chairman, Alternative Investment Management Association
https://www.london-wealth.com/mr-ian-morley/

IN EXQUISITE PRINT: A TRUE FAIRY TALE BOOK 
The hardcover with gold and silver foil on dark blue linen and only title and artwork
The book will be printed in the highest quality, with a dark blue linen hard cover featuring only title, author name and calligraphy by an award winning calligraphy artist (see below) in gold and silver foil. 
The hard cover will have a  dust jacket (paper wrap around cover) that will include the same but including text on the book, author and reviews. The book is aimed to be a piece of art on every finance professional's bookshelve, with or without dust jacket.
The dust jacket can be designed and printed separately, customised for any special occasion you, your family or company may have: a thank you from the CEO to the staff or clients, birthday of a family member in finance, Christmas etc.

BY AN EXPERIENCED PUBLISHED AUTHOR -  ERIK VRIJ 
www.erikvrij.nl 
Book presentations in 1996 and 2013
I am a Dutch finance lawyer, based in Abu Dhabi, with 22 years of experience in international banking and investment management with global banks, covering all finance activities included in the fairy tales: lending, structured finance, corporate finance, investment management, trade finance, financial engineering, fintech, payments, cash management, compliance, risk management, savings and more. 
Editor and writer of diverse publications and articles
Apart from being a lawyer, I have a passion for writing, editing and publishing. During the past 25 years I have written, edited, founded and published a diverse range of publications, a number of which have been published by some of the most reputable publishers. They include an international law journal, a guide to legal studies in Europe, a travel guide, poetry, an alumni member directory and quarterly magazine, articles on (finance) law, newsletter articles, a horoscope and a business thriller.
Sources of inspiration
I have had diverse sources of inspiration for writing, finance and fairy tales. My picturesque Netherlands home town Bergen (NH) has been the home of many famous authors and artists (https://bergenaanzee.com/kunst-cultuur). My wife Brigitte and I have a habit of watching Czech fairy tales traditionally broadcasted in her original home country for Christmas, filled with kings, castles, princesses, white horses and bad guys. 
Being passionate about the Arab world after having travelled to the region and worked with clients in the region, I moved to work in Abu Dhabi early 2018, about 1001 (Arabian) nights ago. I have been living in one of the five beautiful skyscrapers of Etihad Towers, overlooking two of the most magic palaces imaginable, Emirates Palaces and the UAE Presidential Palace, Qasr al Watan (which has an exhibition with the 1001 Arabian Nights included). Combined with work in the finance sector it was easy to be inspired to write a collection of financial fairy tales. With help of Emirati and other regional friends and colleagues I was able to create a true Arabian publication project. 
It is hard not to be inspired by this view from my window
'Once upon a time, there was a palace on a cloud'

The Marken Thriller Express, a tour to the locations of the book
Inspired by tourist trips organised to Dan Brown's book locations in Florence and Rome, I wrote a travel guide to the book's Dutch location, Marken, one of the country's top tourist destinations, visited by over 300,000 tourists each year by ferry of the Volendam Marken Express. In the book (set in 2028) this pictureques folkloric peninsula has become a tax haven European rights management centre with skyscrapers, nicknamed MARKHATTAN.

For the past 20 years, Shawkat has worked for well-known clients in branding, design, advertising for agencies and big corporations and his work has been featured in numerous books and publications focused on the art of calligraphy, with some of his pieces now included in private and public collections throughout the world.
His unique style borrows from the exquisite craftsmanship of traditional practitioners and the vibrancy of contemporary culture, and the diversity of his work stands testimony to the fact that calligraphy knows no borders.
WHO SHOULD READ AND BACK THIS BOOK PROJECT?
The book is aimed at anyone working in the finance industry around the world or who wants to surprise anyone in the finance industry with a unique present.
The fairy tales include roles of coverage bankers, investment bankers, central bankers, regulators, stock brokers, investment managers, CFOs, CEOs, payments, credit cards and cash managers, fintech staff, trade financiers, insurers, compliance officers, lawyers, accountants, borrowers, financial engineers, tax lawyers, risk managers, tellers, financial back office staff and more.
The fairy tales have not been written in a way that requires much technical knowledge, but inevitably some knowledge of the business, jargon, nature and relevant issues is required to fully understand some of them.
A UNIQUE AND FUN BESPOKE (RELATIONSHIP) GIFT
This book is one of a kind. Everyone grew up with some of the fairy tales on which these stories are based, but financial fairy tales have never been written like this before. I have not found anything similar on Google.
Surprise yourself and anyone in your family and network of friends, colleagues, team members, staff, company who is active in finance. Bring out their childhood memories and entertain them with something original and unexpected which they can relate to: fairy tales in a financial setting. As a unique bonus, surprise them by having their name included in the credits section of the book. Who doesn’t want to have a book on the bookshelf with his or her name in it? And don’t worry, this is all as affordable as buying a book in the bookstore.
If you have slightly deeper pockets or a (corporate) budget, consider surprising a larger group of finance professionals by pre-ordering more books at a discount: your team, company, all clients etc. You can include all of their names in the book with a personal printed and/or handwritten message from you and me. You may especially make use of some personalisation options. Consider having a dust jacket (paper wrap around cover) and/or bookmark with your logo, company building photo and a message by you and a photo of you on the back cover, conveying that important (thank you) message to your staff, family, clients or other important persons you want to put in the spotlight. It may even include a bespoke short fairy tale. For Christmas 2020 or any other important occasion. Check out the rewards section. 
A cover or bookmark with your logo, short fairy tale, thank you message, birthday wish: anything!
If you want to go out of your way for that special person, give a fairy tale character his or her name. This is a very exclusive (only two available) and more expensive reward: don’t wait too long!
Last but not least, if you are ready, willing and able (in Covid times) to travel to Abu Dhabi: every book includes an invitation to the book presentation in Abu Dhabi, in December 2020. Another book presentation may be organised in the Netherlands.

I'm a photographer from the UK, and over the past 5 years have been creating and sharing beautiful and reimagined scenes from around Great Britain.
 See some of the Photographs at www.freddieardley.com
LOCATIONS
Aberdeenshire | Ben Nevis | Brecon Beacons | Cairn Gorm Mountains | Cornwall | Cotswolds | Cumbria | Devon | Dorset | Gloucestershire | Glen Coe | Glen Affric | Highlands of Scotland | London | Oxfordshire | The Malverns | Lands End | The Lake District | Hadrian's Wall | Northumberland | Somerset | + More
  THE BOOK 
Note: The cover will change, currently being worked on by designer.
Approx 30x30cm hardback book with glorious archival quality paper and 100-150 pages. 
While I have had a great amount of support and interest in the book, I have not yet been able to fund the offset printing run. 
   FUNDING
So far I have saved £3,000 towards this project and now need to raise as additional £10,000 to cover the £11,500 printing costs for 1,000 copies.
The book will be a beautiful collection of work that many of you have seen on blog.freddieardley.com
  More About The Author
I am a British photographer with a focus on dramatic landscape and architectural urban work. The style of my photography is a mix of painterly emotions with key inspirations from films and historic cultures. This originally started out with the production of my large wall pieces, but has progressively adapted into portraiture and fashion photography.
My love for landscape photography itself began in 2011, when I visited Nepal. Experiencing an overwhelming explosion of culture, architecture and the largest landscapes imaginable. It turned my view of the world upside down and put me on the path of creation.
I run one of the worlds largest photography blogs with readers from 60+ countries per week and followed by 230,000 people. Social media continues to be instrumental in marketing my photography and is always bringing me opportunities to work with companies from around the world. Visit blog.freddieardley.com to find out more.

Scientagious Adventures integrates the latest in maker space computer systems, to create imaginative STEM and STEAM team oriented programs. These programs are designed to foster and build a lasting connection with science and technology for K to 8 grade students. Programming will be delivered to schools, libraries and social settings where participants will be immersed in an exciting team oriented problem solving event or demonstration.
These open ended adventures will allow participants to explore engaging experiences with a focus on hands on maker space activities and/or creative construction projects with an underlying relevance to science or technology.

Kingdom Wars will be showcasing breakin, parkour, and the youth through competition on a higher platform. Kingdom Wars will bring media companies, 400+ attendees, and 150 Competitors from all over the world to Milwaukee, Wisconsin. Stance, having over 2 million followers, will be filming over the entire weekend. Worldwide athletes will be joining together to celebrate the art of dance. Check pointing Milwaukee as the place for dance!
Earn Your Rank 2019 ft. Bboy Ram
Kingdom Wars is a breakin, parkour, and youth competition. Friday, November 15th There will be an adult, kids, and parkour 1v1 competition. Then on Saturday, November 16th we will have the "Unlimited vs Unlimited" Competition. There will be no limit on how many competitors can be on one team. All the competitors will choose a category to compete. Starting in the preliminary rounds the judges will pick a top 16 to compete against each other bracket style.The final two will determine one winner. The winner will gain a merchandise, money, and a plaques a prize.
XIX CULTURE
XIX is a company that specializes in events, clothing, promotion, media, entertainment, and many other services. We support the arts and creatives and attempt to serve a greater purpose towards the world.
Jan Serr Studio Official Kingdom Wars Venue Picture by Studio K10
Parkour Battle
Kingdom Wars will be presenting one of the first ever Parkour Battles. A battle, or round, consists of two athletes free styling their acrobatic and artistic skills over a course of various obstacles. Acrobatic skills may consist of flips, spins, slides, and precision jumps. The course, or arena, will have vault boxes, bar setups, high platforms, etc. to help create an intricate experience for the competitors to do their movement on. As for each round, it’ll start off with prelims which a competitor will go and perform with a time limit of a minute. After that, the Top 16 will be chosen. From there, it’ll be a 1vs1 where we’ll repeat 1 round per person with 1 minute as a max time. This will proceed till the finals where they’ll have 2 rounds with the same max time.  Judges will be judging cleanliness, creativity, execution, and battle interaction.
Earn Your Rank 2019 Mijo vs Agility
Cultural Integration
Kingdom Wars is going to be showcasing many of international cultures through our art of dance.  Competitors and attendees are coming from Africa, Europe, And even Asia to Integrate and exchange exciting performances.  Creating an environment for tourists to come by and be entertained by high energy, exciting talent, and interactive experiences. Whether they’re coming for leisure or serious competition, XIX and Milwaukee, Wisconsin brings an event that supplies both!

Sponsors
This will be the kick start into many other dance competitions. We are looking you to invest into the design of the layout. We want to increase the prize worth for the competitors. Buy and purchase the best for materials and equipment for the battle. Including things like a vinyl floor, led screen, trophies, parkour equipment, monitors, speakers, subs, flyers, shirts, food, housing and posters.
Become a sponsor and have your brand/company push worldwide. You will have a vendor table and your logo pasted all over for others to see. They could get involved and be interested in you. Kingdom Wars will have over 400 attendees looking for things to do. Get involved and help serve a bigger purpose towards the community.
Sponsorship Acknowledgement

Past Events
Earn Your Rank 2019 was one of our past successful events. We had over 250 attendees show to the battle. Over 100 competitors and they resided in many different places. Earn Your Rank had many great reviews, hoping to bring it back to you in 2020.

The vision for this project is the establishment of a women-owned and operated craft brewery in Kigali, Rwanda.
Josephine "Fina" Uwineza
At the heart of the Rwanda Craft Brewery Project is owner Josephine "Fina" Uwineza, a Rwandan woman who is no stranger to entrepreneurship. Uwineza is a successful restaurateur in Rwanda’s capital city of Kigali, where she opened the city’s first-ever Chinese restaurant. It became a go-to destination for tourists and the embassy crowd, and at one time, between her two popular restaurants, she had more than 50 staff employed.
Nancy Coldham
More recently Uwineza shared a business idea with Nancy Coldham, a Toronto-based consultant who has traveled to and worked extensively in Rwanda as a mentor to women entrepreneurs. The connection with Coldham sparked an idea for a Canadian-inspired craft brewery in Rwanda. Coldham reached out to the Ontario Craft Brewers association on behalf of Uwineza, who in turn connected the women with Beau’s All Natural Brewing Co, of Vankleek Hill, Ontario, Canada. 
Group [L-R] Beau’s CEO Steve Beauchesne, Rwandan entrepreneur Fina Uwineza, Beau’s CFO Tanya Beimers, Beau’s Creative Director Jordan Bamforth, photo credit Brendan Coutts
Following several months of teleconferences and emails, a team from Beau’s that included CEO Steve Beauchesne and CFO Tanya Beimers travelled to Rwanda to meet Uwineza in person and get a sense of the scope of the project, as well as some of the specific challenges associated with it. The team also met with officials from the city of Kigali as well as the Republic of Rwanda, and were offered a warm welcome and assistance to help get Uwineza’s Rwanda Craft Brewery Project off the ground.
Christian Riemerschmid von der Heide
Next, Beauchesne and Beimers appealed to equipment suppliers on behalf of the Rwanda Craft Brewery Project to see if special funding considerations were a possibility. Their requests brought the donation of a brewhouse from BC-based Newlands Systems Inc. (NSI). Their COO, Christian Riemerschmid von der Heide, has experience brewing in Africa and has additionally joined the project to assist and consult. The brewhouse would be gifted by NSI as a team effort by their employees through donated time from fabricators, engineers, and brewing staff. It will be purpose-built for the Rwanda Craft Brewery Project.
And now, Eastern Ontario craft brewery Beau’s All Natural is launching this Kickstarter to help Uwineza start the brewery. For their part, Beau’s will also be providing financing, expertise, and hands-on employee training to the start-up brewery. Beau’s co-founder Steve Beauchesne is careful to point out that no profits from the new brewery will flow back to Beau’s or to the other partners.
Craft beer has become a very successful industry in Canada, and since Rwandans drink as much beer as Canadians, this industry would make a positive contribution to the Rwandan business community. The craft brewing industry is taking root in Africa in countries such as Kenya, Botswana and South Africa (with 135 microbrewers) and we believe it is the perfect time for a Rwandan national beer. 
The next steps of the Rwanda Craft Brewery Project requires $95,000 in funding to purchase a bottling line.
Fina, Nancy, as well as the teams at Beau's and NSI, are now asking for your support in bringing Fina's dream to life! Help us by donating to support the Rwanda Craft Brewery Project.

México se ha reconocido por ser un país con una riqueza cultural inigualable, por eso Raizes México quiere impulsar nuestra cultura y darlo a conocer al mundo entero.  
Apóyanos a dar una mejor calidad de vida a las bordadoras indígenas de la región de Santa María Coyomeapan, Puebla.  
Santa Maria Coyomeapan, Puebla
En esta región los hombres se dedican a la agricultura y la mujeres al bordado artesanal, ellas trabajan por varios días como un artista en sus lienzos dando vida a figuras y flores con sus manos y talento único, trabajo que se convertirá en hermosas blusas o vestidos con toque artesanal. 
Ellas desean que su trabajo sea reconocido y que sus bordados sean valorados por su pueblo, por México…
Bordados Artesanales
Para muchas, este arte es su única fuente de ingreso y por esta razón no tienen otra opción que aceptar la paga injusta. Raizes consiente de ello, decidió poner su granito de arena dándoles un pago justo a su trabajo, valorando cada puntada y dando a conocer su talento. 
Queremos darles una mejor calidad de vida, ayudarlas a soñar y que sus sueños se hagan una realidad. Con tu ayuda pondremos el primer Centro de Bordado autosustentable en donde podrán compartir con nuevas generaciones su talento, así como aprender nuevas técnicas de bordado.
Equipo de Raizes : Delia Ortega Rosas, Honorina Villarreal Martínez, Laura Oyuky Bravo Cipriano, Edgar Gerónimo Villarreal, Leslie Guzmán Osornio y Benigno Gerónimo Villarreal
Apóyanos y comparte este proyecto, hagamos que el mundo conozca el gran talento que tiene México, sintámonos orgullos de nuestras raíces y de nuestras artesanas mexicanas. ¡Sé parte de este sueño!  
Para sus instalaciones se contempla lo siguiente:  
 Rentar un espacio físico.  
Materia prima (tela, hilos, reglas, tijeras, aros, agujas, etc…)  
Variedad de sellos para los diseños de las prendas  
Mobiliario (mesas y sillas)  
Publicidad y marketing  
Capacitadores y maestras.  
Pequeñas acciones de varios impulsan grandes sueños.
 #ImpulsandoMexicoArtesanal 
Recompensas:
Contribuir 100 MX$ o más (Nuestra comunidad Raizes)
todas las grandes cosas empezaron con pequeñas acciones. En gratitud a tu apoyo recibirás una carta de agredecimiento vía electrónica.  
Contribuir 250 MX$ o más (Viviendo Moda Artesanal -Zazil)  
Hemos soñado algo mejor y con el apoyo de todos pronto se convertirá en realidad. Recibirás una hermosa blusa bordada a mano y con mucho cariño por mujeres artesanas.  
Zazil
Contribuir 400 MX$ o más (Moda Artesanal -aletilla, chanel, kimona)  
En la cultura esta la memoria de nuestro pueblo, no la olvidemos. Recibirás una blusa artesanal que por generaciones han aprendido a elaborar buscando sea reconocido y valorado en un comercio justo.
Aletilla, Chanel Kimona
Contribuir 580 MX$ o más (Moda Artesanal - Melina ) 
Nadie puede hacerlo todo, pero todos podemos hacer algo. Recibirás un vestido para llevar a México en la Piel en tanto ellas continúan haciendo su trabajo con pasión.
Melina
 Contribuir 600 MX$ o más (Moda Artesanal - Conjunto Chanel, Blusa Bimorí ) 
La solidaridad es la ternura de los pueblos. Recibirás un conjunto de  vestidos (niña- adulto) bordados totalmente a mano, ideal para ocasiones casuales o si lo prefieres una blusa bordada totalmente a mano sobre telas que han aprendido a bordar.

HARLEM'S RATTLERS 
Many people of color have fought and died for this country. Only for many men and their stories to fall in obscurity. The 369th regiment of the rainbow brigade, the Harlem Rattler's as known by their regimental name. This distinguished army group was a monumental force, a story of heroism rarely revealed today. Would be known by their foes as the Hellfighters. For their unrelenting fighting capabilities and prevailing values. From the beginning, this regiment and many others like it faced many trials and tribulations. The war would continue to be at large, fighting racism at their own home front among it's own nation and the other abroad against Europe in France. As told by the war department in the year 1917 "that black was not a color in the rainbow" had since endured the mountainous adversity to be overcame. Known as the Great War, WWI the French would attribute it's success's.  Based on the 369th regiment of the 93rd division of the 15th infantry. 
Why Kickstarter? 

I am a navy veteran and have served amongst the ranks of my fellow servicemen and women. I have long heard a story about an all black regiment known as the Harlem Hellfighters. Who fought during the Great War. And had little recognition for their feats they accomplished. Many of them passed after the war due to the battle within their minds. The one's back at home and the war on the frontlines. Torrential turmoil by those of it's own nation, hanged or shot down in cold blood for wearing their uniforms. As well as judged by the color of their skin. These brave soldiers gave their lives for its country. But they in return, received nothing. We have compiled and have diligently researched this story and would love to tell it to the world. And to make a pilot is what our ultimate vision and goal is. And we would love it if you could contribute and help us reveal this dream to everyone else. The script is, compiled and finalized. And we would like help for the necessities of filming, editing, camerawork, videography, actors and permits to finally make it a reality. 
The 369th Regiment 
The Characters
This script and pilot will be based on the historical data from the archives of military history. 

James Europe - an composer and musician who led the first negro band in the army. His band would be known throughout history as one of the best army bands to exist. 

Henry Johnson - a unassuming man from north Carolina. Who moved to Albany, New York with a southern drawl. That would later be known as a hero amongst the division. 

Noble Sissle- friend and colleague of James Europe. Also a musician and college educated midwesterner had come to New York in hopes of becoming a musical sensation.
Julian King Monroe: Actor, Writer and Director. A Navy veteran, whom has performed in several theatrical plays; to include and name such works as. "Soul Mates", " Soul mates II" and "Roomates" by Sidney Cooper. "Voices in My Head" at the Lancaster College and The "24 Hour experiment" in the Point Loma Playhouse. Also working with great Teachers and Actors like Deanna Driscoll and Paul Tinder who is the creator of (PASA) Performing Arts San Antonio. As well as competing in the Monologue City Competition in Atlanta. He has honed his craft of acting for over 10 years while in and out of the armed forces. Loving the art of acting and every aspect of the film world, now wants to step into his role as a CREATOR through other art forms; writing, producing and directing! Author of this “Harlem Hellfighters” script and is determined to tell this story to the world the way it should have been told, on FILM. His vision is to turn this script into a pilot and to pitch it to a network and make this vision a reality. 

Steve Simms: Writer and Producer. A great counselor, who has 18 years of service in the Navy. A writer at heart with an exceptional art for storytelling. A Radio Personality and Counselor on his Podcast "Disconnected" https://anchor.fm/dscnntd/support . Where he and his co-host Bryant discuss real life issues on mental health, self development, personal experiences and more. The Co-Author of this script “Harlem Hellfighters”, he is excited to bring history back to life through this project.

Jess Ashook: Public Relations. An amazing artist, Navy veteran, writer, visual arts major and entrepreneur. Owner of "Empress Jess Designs" https://www.empressjessdesigns.com/ where she creatively conceptualizes a variety of ideas and brings them to life through the art of design.  Currently a UCSD Media Major with an Associates in Humanities from Mesa Community College, she diligently compiled the marketing, designs and video edits for this project!

As fans of fantasy and science fiction, my friends, wife, and I have been participating in Fargo CoreCon. For the last two years,  we have been running the MST3K -S.O.L consuite.  We are excited to be returning for a third year. While enjoying last year's con the theme "A Touch of Evil" was announced.  All of the things we could do with a second consuite  were running through my mind.  Then it hit me, an Asylum.
The challenges we are facing are making sure we can provide two spectacular,  unique experiences. A few members of our creative team for S.O.London consuite are finding other time constraints.  So, we are looking to the CoreCon community for assistance. 
In the Asylum, we will be offering a look into the history of medical treatment for the "insane". Experience wearing a straight jacket. Committ your friends and family or maybe they will admit you. And hopefully a lot more.
As a thank you for being a supporter of this new consuite, we are offering you mock patient files to be enjoyed by con goers,  our caffeinated brownies with or without bacon, and lastly our handmade straight jackets. 
Thank you for your time.  Please continue to enjoy the S.O.L consuite and now we hope to bring you a little... mental health.

Stu “Rat” Ratelli joins a deep space colony ship in hopes of leaving his drug addiction and disgraced military service behind.  Halfway across the universe the ship is attacked by a genetically enhanced saboteur. Rat and a group of Combat Vets will need to stop the saboteur and put the ship back on course before they run out of supplies. 
 The Writer Jeff Turner brilliantly crafted Delta Zero to play right into a series making it a long term money maker.     
Delta Zero will cast real Combat Vets in key roles.  In fact Delta Zero was conceived on set of Breck Eisners Beyond with a group Vets headed by US Marine Matt Sigloch.  This gives Delta Zero a built in following from service personnel who it will have a symbiotic relationship with.    
In addition to the numerous vets in the cast and crew, Delta Zero will benefit Disabled Service Personnel and their Families.  The Delta Zero Foundation will have an emphasis on serving the Families who have lost a Parent.

Etemenanki, Technofantasy Role Playing Game è un Gioco di Ruolo con un'ambientazione originale costruita in trent'anni di campagne ininterrotte e un regolamento sviluppato e rinnovato in due anni di lavoro e playtest.
Sulla nostra pagina facebook trovi delle dirette in continuo aggiornamento, dove spieghiamo l'ambientazione e il regolamento!
Iscriviti alla nostra newsletter per tutte le novità! Per provare il gioco, organizziamoci insieme su Discord: ti aspettiamo sul nostro canale!

 Etemenanki, Technofantasy Role Playing Game utilizza un sistema originale chiamato "Systemenanki" basato sul D20 Under, dove i personaggi sono sempre proattivi in ogni situazione che si pone loro davanti.

Etemenanki,Technofantasy Role Playing Game è ambientato in un mondo cruento e misterioso. Potrai interpretare creature appena giunte su Kronhos dai propri universi attraverso la Soglia dei Mondi, mentre scoprono giorno per giorno la sconfinata ambientazione che si presenta loro. Vedrai un Impero dominato dai non morti, potenti Gilde corrotte e senza scrupoli, battaglie combattute in nome della fede in meschine divinità. Dovrai sopravvivere ai Guardiani del Paradosso e agli ermetici Eterni, o semplicemente non morire di fame in un qualche angolo di una sperduta Strada di Nessuno.
Solo la Shaddakh, la fratellanza verso i tuoi compagni, potrà darti una possibilità di salvezza.

La scelta delle stirpi giocanti è estremamente variegata, dando la possibilità ai giocatori di interpretare personaggi non morti, mezzi angeli, mezzi elementali, mannari, golem e creature biomeccaniche fino ai classici elfi, nani e orchi, ma con le particolarità che queste etnie hanno nel mondo di Etemenanki. 
Nel manuale saranno presentate fino a quaranta stirpi giocanti e, in base al successo del kickstarter, si potrà arrivare a cinquantacinque.  [STRETCH GOAL SBLOCCATO 55/55 STIRPI NEL MANUALE BASE!]
La scelta iniziale delle corporazioni (le classi) sarà di dieci, con una varietà di ruoli tra cui scegliere che andrà dal cavalcadaemoni al templare, fino ad arrivare a venti, in base al supporto che avremo da parte vostra nel progetto. [STRETCH GOAL SBLOCCATO 20/20 CORPORAZIONI NEL MANUALE BASE!]
Potrete padroneggiare dall’alta magia fino alle tecnologie avveniristiche, passando per gli innesti bionici o biogenetici, i simbionti e le armi da fuoco e al laser, in un’ambientazione dove la magia e la scienza si contrastano da migliaia di secoli.
Il Quartiere dei Miracoli, uno dei quartieri della città di Babilonia. Disegno di Silvia Pasqualetto.
Etemenanki, Technofantasy Role Playing Game è stato testato e sviluppato in lunghe campagne di gioco e dalle scelte compiute dalle centinaia di giocatori che hanno vissuto le più grandi leggende di Kronhos, il pianeta su cui si svolgeranno le vostre avventure. Ogni aspetto dell’ambientazione è nato e cresciuto attraverso una solida coerenza narrativa che ha creato uno sviluppo di trama equilibrato e veramente esteso.

Cosa aspetti? Varca le porte della Città Immortale, raisind...

Attraverso la Torre di Etemenanki, entra nella mitica Babilonia, la città dove giungono da ogni luogo e tempo del Cronoverso, l’insieme di tutti gli universi spaziali e temporali, i raisindi (viandanti), portando le loro conoscenze, la loro scienza, i loro dèi, le loro leggende e persino le architetture provenienti dalle loro terre.
Crea la tua Libera Compagnia di avventurieri, la Shaddakh, ed esplora un mondo sconfinato!
Cammina per le vie della Città Immortale, Babilonia, tra i quartieri coperti dall’ombra dell’infinita Torre, dove innumerevoli stirpi diverse si muovono tra loro come tumultuosi fiumi attraverso la più grande metropoli del Cronoverso. Qui potrai vedere, nel Quartiere dei Sapienti, esseri meccanici parlare di filosofia con daemoniti, e pallidi elfi bere in malfamate taverne insieme a insettoidi dai colori sgargianti.
Nel Quartiere dei Mercanti osserverai orchi monocoli dalle quattro braccia contrattare con metavermoidi avidi di denari nelle botteghe e, guardando verso il cielo, vedrai felinoidi cavalcare manticore alate, sfidando scalcinati biplani guidati da folli gremlin. Scruterai rattoidi attendere qualche ignara vittima nel Quartiere di Sotto, tra le tenebre e una lama nascosta, mentre magdum, maghi empi di magia, si scontrano contro inquisitori-scienziati del culto della Realtà a causa di odi primordiali mai sopiti.
Procurarti cibo ed equipaggiamenti resistenti non sarà semplice, e nessuno si meraviglierà vedendoti depredare un nemico per impossessarti dei suoi stivali o di pezzi d’armatura ancora in buono stato.

Molte sono le strade che potrai intraprendere durante le tue avventure:
 Dare la tua fedeltà alle Gilde e accrescere il loro corrotto controllo sul mondo di Kronhos.
 Azzardare al “Gioco del Mastrovingio”, dove aristocratici non morti tramano in palazzi barocchi l’ambizione del potere assoluto.
 Combattere per il Nero Imperatore e la sua Legione di non morti senzienti, oppure contro di esso unendoti alle insorte Città-Stato, o ai postnucleari ribelli delle Lande Perdute della Dannatio, signori delle Macchine Creatomiche corrotte dalla letale Consuntione, la radiazione dell'anti-esistenza.
 Abbracciare fanaticamente la fede nella tua divinità, per poter ambire a divenire un Avatar colmo di fervore durante le sanguinose Feste dei Cento Culti!
 Ricercare l’immortalità attraverso la gloria degli Eterni, ricordandoti che la Guerra Senza Tempo pretende sacrifici, poiché molti dovranno cadere per tua mano nel Labirinto Eterno affinché tu possa vivere per sempre.
 Comprendere le vie del Fato sfuggendo al Clavigero e ai suoi Ancolieri, i custodi dei Cancelli del Tempo per cui tu non sei null’altro che una Fractura da saldare con le Chiavi del Paradosso.
Il Sacro Ordine Templare, i difensori dei Culti di Kronhos
Le avventure che potrai vivere nel mondo di Etemenanki sono innumerevoli! Starà a te scegliere il cammino da percorrere e sempre a te il sopravvivere a esso!
Sii un fulgido eroe, qui dove il bene e il male non esistono, o scegli di essere uno spietato criminale senza scrupoli. Tanto, nessuno è mai completamente innocente agli occhi degli dèi crudeli e implacabili di Kronhos.

Etemenanki, Technofantasy Role Playing Game ha una struttura di regolamento completo per ogni evenienza narrativa. 
"Systemenanki" è un sistema D20 Under. Le sfide sono divise in Prove di Difficoltà, in cui basterà stare col tiro del dado sotto o pari al valore della caratteristica o abilità utilizzata, e Prove di Contrasto, che risolveranno i conflitti con gli antagonisti, in cui vincerà chi riuscirà a totalizzare il punteggio assoluto migliore tra tutti.
Le armature hanno un valore di corazza che si detrae dai danni subiti, ma, con l'uso delle regole opzionali, avranno anche la possibilità di rompersi, così come le armi, e rendere il recupero degli equipaggiamenti una parte molto interessante del gioco.
Come dicevamo, il sistema è organizzato su diverse regole opzionali per permettere ai giocatori di scegliere la propria esperienza di gioco in base alla profondità dell’applicazione delle stesse. Tra le regole opzionali troverete: la possibilità di portare i colpi in combattimento alle diverse locazioni del corpo, l'utilizzo delle abilità per specializzare maggiormente il personaggio, la rottura degli equipaggiamenti, l'ingombro sul movimento, le malattie da infezione, l'uso dei colpi ardui (critici) e dei colpi ostili (fumble) nel combattimento e anche nell'utilizzo della magia, e diverse altre.
Il manuale base che vi andiamo a proporre sarà completo di tutto il sistema di gioco, comprese le regole opzionali. Starà voi scegliere quali utilizzare!

Le molteplici scelte sulle stirpi e le corporazioni giocabili danno al mondo di Etemenanki una tridimensionalità eccezionale, così come la varietà della magia, dei poteri e delle religioni. Si potrà persino, se lo si vorrà, costruire i personaggi in maniera completamente casuale, in modo che non possano mai esisterne due completamente uguali!
Un Golem meccanico
I personaggi che giocherete sono più forti della media rispetto a quelli creati in un gioco di ruolo classico. Essi appartengono già alle corporazioni, un'elite all'interno delle carriere di Gilda a cui normalmente gli altri abitanti di Kronhos possono ambire.  Ognuno, ha abilità particolari specifiche in modo da renderli molto specializzati nel proprio ruolo. Questo perché l'ambientazione, essendo particolarmente cruenta, necessità di personaggi forti che possano sopravvivere alle mille avversità che incontreranno. 
Le caratteristiche del personaggio influenzano a cascata tutte le parti della scheda rendendo veramente omogenea la parte di comprensione dell'uso di quest'ultima, oltre ad avere un'estetica accattivante dovuta all'ingegno di Luca Martinelli.
Scheda completa con regole opzionali
La risoluzione dei conflitti, dal combattimento al lancio delle magie, al voler convincere un antagonista, al comprendere un inganno o derubare qualcuno, si risolve sempre con Prove di Contrasto in cui ogni partecipante è proattivo nell'azione. Non sarai mai un testimone attonito di quel che succede, ma potrai sempre agire sfruttando le tue risorse di gioco!
La magia funziona attraverso il consumo di una riserva di Punti Mistici per essere utilizzata, questo da molta varietà di scelta immediata nelle azioni dei personaggi con questi ruoli.
Il combattimento può, grazie a regole opzionali a scelta, divenire veramente pericoloso per coloro che ne sono coinvolti, con anche regole opzionali di guarigione e cura avanzate per un maggior realismo applicato al gioco.

Le avventure si possono sviluppare su più livelli, dalla classica one-shot alla vera e propria campagna. Le strutture caratteriali dei personaggi con le limitazioni date da stirpe e corporazione, possono creare diversi contrasti all'interno del gruppo, per visioni diverse che possono andare dall'utilizzo della magia fino alle diatribe religiose. Nelle one-shot questi rendono dinamici i rapporti di Shaddakh, compagnia, mentre nelle campagne daranno ai giocatori la possibilità di crescere e cooperare anche in situazioni sociali difficili, ma che potranno portare all'esaltazione del miglior gioco di squadra.
La crescita del personaggio, attraverso il classico salire di livello grazie all'accumulo di Punti Esperienza, dona, oltre agli avanzamenti di Corporazione, a ogni passaggio un pool di Punti Livello, utilizzabili per poter aumentare i propri valori a scelta, dando piena libertà al giocatore di far eccellere il personaggio dove preferisce.

Si può scegliere di giocare in diversi modi a Etemenanki, Technofantasy Role Playing Game. Starà a tutto il gruppo decidere durante la Sessione 0, prima della creazione dei personaggi, cosa voler fare della vita dei loro eroi.
Potete strutturare diverse campagne di gioco, qui di seguito vi diamo degli esempi generici che saranno spiegati nel dettaglio nel Manuale Base. Potete liberamente mischiarli o crearne voi stessi di nuovi, questi sono solo degli spunti indicativi:
 Campagna Libera, dove i personaggi si muovono attraverso le classiche avventure.
 Campagna di Gilda, dove i personaggi compiono missioni al fine di salire di grado e di potere all'interno della propria gilda, fino a doversi scontrare con i loro maestri e prenderne il posto. Questa campagna è abbastanza semplice per i principianti.
 Campagna Imperiale, dove i personaggi, fedeli all'impero, cercano di far cadere gli insorti e le città ribelli per schiacciarli sotto il giogo di Babilonia.
 Campagna Infiltrati, dove i personaggi, legati alle città ribelli, si infiltrano nell'Impero per cercare di distruggerlo.
 Campagna Eterna, dove i personaggi entrano tra le fila degli Eterni per raggiungere l'immortalità e sconfiggere le genie nemiche.
 Campagna del Paradosso, dove i personaggi sono delle Fracture nella trama del Tempo e dovranno trovare il modo di sopravvivere ai guardiani del Paradosso, muovendosi nel tempo e ricucendo gli strappi temporali che li perseguitano.
Naturalmente, molte campagne possono compenetrarsi o dare spunti tra loro, avete piena libertà di giocare come volete!
All'interno del manuale di Etemenanki, Technofantasy Role Playing Game troverete tutte le indicazioni per aiutare i giocatori a scegliere il tipo di gioco che preferiscono, utilizzando regole opzionali e sistemi di poteri adatti al ruolo che intendono giocare. 
Nell'ambientazione stessa ci saranno diversi paragrafi chiamati spunti, tra le descrizioni generali, che daranno idee narrative per permettere di creare avventure o campagne legate al mondo di Kronhos. La vastità dell'ambientazione permette di giocare ogni luogo o trama in modo immersivo, dando la possibilità di scoprire i misteri e i segreti nascosti in essa dalle orditure del tempo. 

Il progetto Etemenanki ha come obbiettivo il portare, dopo 30 anni di gioco ininterrotto e 2 anni di serrato playtest del regolamento, finalmente alla luce un manuale completo di 420 pagine, stampato e illustrato a colori, con copertina rigida e il cui interno comprende tutto ciò che serve per giocare, gestire le avventure e il gioco e creare i personaggi, oltre al sistema di combattimento, la magia, la tecnologia, gli equipaggiamenti, le divinità, i mostri e la suggestiva ambientazione.
A destra una bancarella del Quartiere dei Mercanti, a sinistra un Angralfar, un elfo delle ombre. Mock-up di manuale aperto, disegni di Simone Tavecchio e Silvia Pasqualetto.
Dalla nascita di Etemenanki come idea embrionale, nel lontano 1987, numerosi sono stati coloro che hanno giocato, amato e arricchito sia l’ambientazione che il sistema regolistico creati entrambi da Antonino Galimi. Ognuno ha lasciato un segno e un ricordo indelebile che si trova tra le pagine di questo manuale, chi con la propria arte, chi con le proprie idee e chi con le proprie capacità nell’interpretare quelli che sono divenuti personaggi e stirpi iconiche del gioco.
Illustrazione della Sala del Korshad, sede dell'Imperatore Mors Ghota I e del Sinodo Nefarita. Mock-up di manuale aperto. Illustrazione di Silvia Pasqualetto
Dal 2018 ci siamo decisi a rendere reale questo sogno e abbiamo iniziato a costruire una squadra di artisti, grafici ed editor che potessero supportarci nel compimento dell’opera.
Le quattro Gilde di Babilonia. Mock-up di manuale aperto.
La spettacolare copertina di Federico Musetti da perfettamente l'idea del mondo che vi accingete a visitare. Le illustrazioni di Silvia Pasqualetto aprono tutti i capitoli che compongono il manuale, con tavole a doppia e a singola facciata facendovi tuffare un passo alla volta nell'ambientazione. Gli oltre ottanta ritratti delle stirpi e delle corporazioni di Simone Tavecchio danno una perfetta idea dei personaggi che potete interpretare o incontrare nel mondo di Kronhos. Le illustrazioni dei tarocchi, delle divinità, alcuni disegni interni e i molti simboli grafici di Sabrina Normani, danno quel senso di meraviglia che colpisce chi attraversa la Torre di Etemenanki. Il progetto grafico del manuale, molti ritratti e dei disegni interni creati da Gaja Granata, dimostrano la professionalità che incontrerete quando avrete questo libro tra le mani. Il bestiario curato da Filippo Munegato darà forma ai mostri che popolano le terre di Babilonia. Molti dei simboli grafici creati da Manuel Strali sono parte integrante dell'iconografia dell'ambientazione, il vitruviano babilonese di Matteo Pagliari della scheda, le armi di Paolo Volpi, i disegni di Francesco Gennari, la mappa di Vasco Gioachini, rendono il manuale completo e curato e, senza l'aiuto dell'editor Davide Cencini, non avremmo sicuramente avuto un prodotto così preciso nei minimi particolari.
Menzione d'onore per il coinvolgente video di presentazione realizzato dallo Studio Carabas con la voce narrante di Fabrizio Careddu.
Nella pagina a sinistra, la raffigurazione di Tad'Murah - la Nera Imperatrice e il tarocco dello Ierofante, nella pagina a destra il dio dell'Acqua Wakon. Illustrazioni di Sabrina Normani
Ma, sarà comunque grazie al vostro aiuto se riusciremo a trasformare il sogno di Etemenanki in realtà e avere tra le mani un manuale fisico da poter usare, tutti insieme, per creare altri trent'anni di avventure! 
Sostenente un progetto veramente indipendente, costruito su anni di lavoro e sogni da eccezionali artisti e determinati game-designer!

Il Labirinto Eterno: l'avventura ufficiale di Etemenanki RPG
 Una nuova avventura introduttiva che farà addentrare i Personaggi all’interno della trama della Guerra Senza Tempo degli Eterni. Gli farà compiere scelte e comprendere il segreto del Tempo nel mondo di Kronhos. Sarà in PDF e gratuita per tutti i backers al raggiungimento dello stretch goal relativo!
Copertina dell'avventura, disegno di Silvia Pasqualetto
 "Si narra che il Labirinto Eterno si perda nell'Interstizio, una sorta di demipiano che si sviluppa dentro le mura di Babilonia stessa. Qui vi sono regioni sconfinate, sotterranei, persino città perdute. In questo luogo si smarriscono gli Eterni sconfitti o coloro che non sono degni di appartenere alla loro genia. Solo la follia esiste negli occhi di chi si abbandona in esso e l'unica salvezza ti potrà condannare per sempre alla Guerra Senza Tempo!"

I pledge sono i kit che scegli di acquistare in base a quanto vorrai supportare il nostro progetto. I pledge "EARLY BIRD" sono uguali a quelli con lo stesso nome, ma costano meno se li acquisterai nei primi giorni di campagna kickstarter.  
Man mano che la campagna prosegue seguite sempre il riassunto dei pledge, poiché possono incrementarsi come contenuto grazie al raggiungimento degli stretch goals!
In caso di pledge fisici, controlla le spese di spedizione!
  Per i Pledge riferiti alle magliette esclusive, la scatola portadadi e la creazione del PnG, contattateci a infogdr@etemenanki.it per le specifiche delle taglie, il nome e tutte le informazioni.

 I Pledge seguenti sono esclusivi per negozi fisici e Associazioni GdR e GdT
 Condividi il progetto per poter raggiungere più stretch goals possibili e sbloccare tantissimi contenuti speciali, creati anche da nomi illustri dell'ambiente del Gdr italiano! 
Ci sono sia goals finanziari in base a quanto riusciamo ad ottenere di finanziamento attraverso il vostro supporto, che community goals che si sbloccheranno al raggiungimento di obbiettivi comunitari come il like sulla pagina Etemenanki, Technofantasy Role Playing Game o il crescere del numero di backers che ci sostengono. Quindi forza! Condividete il progetto e mostratelo ai vostri amici.
Più riusciremo a salire, più amici potranno aiutarci a creare nuovi fantastici contenuti!
Offerta a prezzo speciale riservata ai soli negozi fisici di giochi di società e di ruolo. 
Potete acquistare quanti Retail desiderate. Se volete variare il Retail o aggiungere altro materiale tra quello esclusivo Kickstarter, contattateci a urbanlegendparma@hotmail.it
N.B. Tutti gli Stretch Goals ottenuti dalla campagna saranno inseriti anche nel Pledge Retail! 

Per aggiungere un Add-On dovete usare il pulsante "Gestisci il tuo contributo", dopodichè dovete modificare manualmente il totale del contributo, sommando il costo dell’Add-On (o degli Add-On) selezionato.
Esempio: 
Se hai sostenuto il pledge Cronotecario Maggiore da 70 € e vuoi aggiungere una Scatola Portadadi in legno da 30 €, il tuo pledge totale dovrà diventare 100 €, (70+30 €). All'attivazione del Pledge Manager, circa 1-2 settimane dalla conclusione della campagna, troverai un credito di 30 €, con cui potrai confermare l’Add-On precedentemente scelto.

CARTA – Save our Planet
Über CARTA: 
CARTA wurde 2020 mit dem Ziel gegründet, das Umweltbewusstsein aller durch die Kleidung die wir täglich tragen zu stärken. Dabei stehen die Stickmuster von bedrohten und ausgestorbenen Tier- und Pflanzenarten im Mittelpunkt. Durch die Verbindung von nachhaltigen Kleidungsstücken mit digitalen Lösungen wie Computer Vision & Augmented Reality bringen wir durch "The Story Behind" die unverwechselbaren Stickmuster zum Leben und helfen euch dabei, die packenden Geschichten hinter den Arten zu erzählen. Unser einzigartiges "Save our Planet" Konzept unterstützt zudem Organisation wie das Jane Goodball Institut Deutschland, die bedrohten Arten vor dem Aussterben zu retten.
Philipp & Max von CARTA Clothing
Hallo mein Name ist Philipp, bin 28 Jahre und komme ursprünglich vom Bodensee (dem badischen Teil, was ich auch nicht müde werde zu betonen). Ich spiele unheimlich gerne Tennis und Handball oder gehe in die Berge. Falls es euch interessiert, verrate ich euch woher der Name CARTA kommt und erzähle euch dabei noch eine der schönsten Liebesgeschichten die ihr je gehört habt. Fun Fact: Während meines Bachelors habe ich knapp über 1.000 Bäume eigenhändig gepflanzt ;) 
Und ich bin Max, 29 Jahre alt und gebürtiger Franke, jetzt zuhause in der bayrischen Landeshauptstadt München. Ich bin schon mein Leben lang eng mit unserer Natur verbunden, sei es beim Segeln auf deutschen Seen, den Meeren oder Wandern in den heimischen Bergen. Leider habe ich nicht ganz so viele Bäume wie Philipp gepflanzt, habe aber dafür lange Jahre unter anderem Schafe als Haustiere gehalten ;)
Die CARTA Mode: 
Jedes unsere CARTA Kleidungsstücke hat ein einzigartiges Stickmuster einer ausgestorbenen oder bedrohten Tier- & Pflanzenart. Diese Arten befinden sich im Zentrum unserer Mode. 
CARTA - Mens Fit | Snow White | Alle Stickmuster
CARTA - Stickmuster der bedrohten & ausgestorbenen Arten
Cao-Vit Gibbon (bedroht | Population 47): Der Cao-Vit Gibbon ist eine vom Aussterben bedrohte Primatenart, die im chinesisch-vietnamesischen Grenzgebiet beheimatet ist. Die Männchen haben ein nahezu komplett schwarzes und die Weibchen ein farbenfrohes gelb- bis beigebraunes Fell. Die Ausbreitung des Menschen und die gezielte Jagd auf das Tier haben dazu geführt, dass heute weniger als 50 Exemplare leben. Um den Erhalt der Spezies zu sichern, wurden als erste Maßnahme neue Wälder in China und Vietnam gepflanzt was jedoch bei weitem nicht ausreicht, um die Tiere vor dem Aussterben zu schützen.
Viola Cryana (ausgestorben | 1939): Die Viola Cryana ist eine ausgestorbene Veilchenart, die als Endemit in dem französischen Departement Yvonn heimisch war. Endemiten sind nur in einer bestimmten Region heimisch, wodurch sie sehr anfällig für äußere Einflüsse sind. Die Viola wurde bis zu 12 cm groß und hatte dabei relativ große Blüten in einer hellen, violetten Farbe. Sie wurde erst 1878 wissenschaftlich beschrieben, gilt jedoch bereits seit 1939 als ausgestorben. Der industrielle Kalksteinbergbau zur Zementherstellung hat dazu geführt, dass der begrenzte Lebensraum zerstört wurde. Ohne diesen konnte die Viola Cryana nicht überleben.
Eskimo Curlew (ausgestorben | 1963): Der Eskimo Curlew (Brachvogel) ist eine ausgestorbene Vogelart, die in Kanada und Alaska beheimatet war. Die Vögel nisteten im freien Gelände auf dem Boden und reisten als Zugvögel in den Wintermonaten bis nach Argentinien und Chile. Charakteristisch für den Brachvogel waren die grauen Beine und das dunkelbraune Gefieder mit einem hellbraunen Bauch. Anfang des 19. Jahrhunderts wurden jährlich bis zu 2 Million Tiere durch den Menschen getötet, bis 1963 die letzte Sichtung auf Barbados bestätigt wurde. Seitdem wurde der Vogel nicht mehr gesehen und gilt als ausgestorben.
Vaquita (bedroht | Population 15): Der kalifornische Schweinswal oder „Vaquita“ ist eine Walart, die im nördlichen Teil des Golfs von Kalifornien beheimatet ist. Sie ist die am stärksten gefährdete Walart der Welt und wird seit 1996 als vom Aussterben bedroht eingestuft – die Jagd zu Wasser durch den Menschen hat zu dieser Bedrohung geführt, obwohl der Vaquita nur Beifang und nicht das eigentliche Ziel der Jagd ist. Im März 2018 lebten nur noch 12 bis 15 Vaquitas, was unvermeidlich zum Aussterben der Art führen wird, wenn keine drastischen Maßnahmen ergriffen werden. Das Wort Vaquita ist spanisch für „kleine Kuh“.
